Какой бы ни была конкретная цепная реакция, и насколько бы невероятной она ни была, беспорядочная катастрофа создает значительные проблемы для ваших врагов на обширной территории, оставляя всех остальных в покое.

Совершите @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Выстерл} дистанц.оружием и если вы попадаете, то можете сделать еще @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Выстерл} в цель в пределах 30ФТ от первой. Если вы попадаете во вторую цель, совершите Выстрел в третью цель в пределах 30ФТ от второй цели и так далее, пока не промахнетесь. Вы можете прекратить цепочку в любой момент; в противном случае, она прекращается когда вы первый раз промахиваетесь атакой.

Однако, вы не можете целиться в одно и то же существо более 1 раза; каждый раз, когда вы переходите к новой цели, это должна быть цель, в которую вы еще не @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Стреляли} во время этого использования Цепной Реакции.

Этот урон вызван каким-то невероятным стечением обстоятельств, которое ранит одну цель за другой, а не тем, что вы действительно сделали несколько выстрелов. Возможно, вы выстрелили в ветку дерева, которая упала на цели, или из-за крика одной цели, другая случайно прострелила себе ногу из пистолета. Это означает, что только первая цель получает какие-либо специальные эффекты, связанные с пулей (например, если это была магическая амуниция), но каждая цель, в которую вы попали, получает такой же урон, нанесенный вашим Выстрелом.

Обычно весь урон имеет тот же тип, что и изначальная пуля. Однако Мастер может изменить тип урона, основываясь на описании цепной реакции. Например, если одна цель была обожжена огнем, то вместо физического урона она может получить урон от огня.

entries.name: Посвящение Борца
entries.description:
Ваша тренировка искусству борьбы сделала вас особенно умелым в передвижении, нанесении ударов и захватах, когда вы на легке.

♦ Вы становитесь ЭКСПЕРТ Атлетика

♦ Вы получаете способность навыка @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KxaYlC50zzHysJj8]{Борец с Титанами}

♦ Вы не получаете штраф Обстоятельства -2 за совершение смертельной атаки своими несмертельными безоружными атаками.

♦ Вы получаете бонус Обстоятельства +2 к вашему КС СТК сопротивляясь попыткам врага @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD] вас или @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.uJSseLa57HZYSMUu].

Особенность:Вы не можете выбрать другую способность посвящения, пока не получите 2 другие способности из @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.drgCQcXZbIJU0Zhw].

entries.name: Высвобождающий Прогиб
entries.description:
Триггер: Существо дает вам состояние @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схвачен} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаем}

Ваше умение скручивать тела врагов в болезненные замки и захваты делает вас особенно искусным в выходе из таких же затруднительных положений.

Совершите проверку @Check[type:athletics], чтобы @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Вырваться} от спровоцир.состояния. Вы получаете к этой проверке бонус Обстоятельства +2.

entries.name: Болевой Прием
entries.description:
Требования: У вас есть @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченное} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемое} существо

Вы изгибаете тело или конечность своего врага в болезненное положение, из-за чего ему становится тяжело сохранять хватку.

Совершите безоружный @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удар} ближнего боя по @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченному} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемому} вами существу. В дополнение к обычным эффектам @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удара}, он получает следующие.

Крит.Успех: Вы выбиваете из хватки существа 1 удерживаемый предмет. Предмет падает на землю в пространстве существа.

Успех: Вы ослабляете хватку врага на одном удерживаемом предмете. До начала хода этого существа, попытки @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Разоружить} этот предмет у врага получают бонус Обстоятельства +2 и цель получает штраф Обстоятельства -2 на атаки с помощью этого предмета или другие проверки требующие крепкой хватки этого предмета.

entries.name: Суплекс
entries.description:
Требования: У вас есть @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченное} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемое} существо

Изгибаясь всем телом, вы перекидываете врага через свою голову и швыряете его о землю.

Совершите безоружный @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удар} ближнего боя по @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченному} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемому} вами существу. В дополнение к обычным эффектам @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удара}, он получает следующие.

Успех: Цель падает @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Ничком}

Крит.Успех: Цель падает @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Ничком} и получает дополнительный [[/r 2d6[bludgeoning]]]{2d6} Дробящ.

Независимо от успешности @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удара}, вы немедленно отпускаете цель.

entries.name: Удар в Клинче
entries.description:
Триггер: @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченное} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемое} вами существо успешно @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Вырывается}

Ваши враги не могут ускользнуть от вашего захвата не получив по заслугам.

Совершите по спровоцир.существу безоружный @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удар} ближнего боя.

entries.name: Удар с Разбега
entries.description:
Вы кидаетесь на своего врага, жестоко ударяя его с разбега всем телом.

@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Переместитесь} вплоть до своей Скорости, а затем нанесите безоружный @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удар} ближнего боя. Если вы попали, то можете попытаться @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.yNry1xMZqdWHncbV]{Толкнуть}@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{*} цель.

entries.name: Усмирающий Захват
entries.description:
Требования: У вас есть @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченное} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемое} существо

Ваша железная хватка медленно истощает силы вашего врага.

Совершите проверку @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.i95kcGLIQKOTsnv6]{Атлетики} для @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Захвата} уже @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченного} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемого} вами существа, со следующими эффектами вместо обычных.

Крит.Успех: Цель @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Ослаблен 2} до конца своего след.хода и @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Ослаблен 1} на 1 минуту

Успех: Цель @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Ослаблен 1} до конца своего след.хода

entries.name: Удушение
entries.description:
Требования: У вас есть @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченное} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемое} существо

Вы изгибаете и сжимаете врага, удушая его.

Совершите безоружный @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удар} ближнего боя по @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченному} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемому} вами существу. При Успех вы получаете бонус Обстоятельства к урону, равный кол-ву костей урона оружия и цель едва может говорить до начала вашего след.хода или пока не @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Вырвется}, в зависимости от того, что произойдет раньше.

Пока цель едва может говорить, она не может произносить звуки выше хриплого шепота и должна совершить успешную @Check[type:flat|dc:10|showDC:all], иначе теряет любое действие, требующее речи.

Если требующее речи действие, является также действием воздействия, как например, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Сотворение} с жестовыми и словесными компонентами, то цель просто кидает 1 чистую проверку КС 10, а не дополнительную чистую проверку КС 5 из-за того что @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схвачена}.

entries.name: Воздушный Копер
entries.description:
Требования: У вас есть @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченное} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемое} существо

Поднимая в воздух себя и врага, вы обрушиваетесь на землю.

Совершите безоружный @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удар} ближнего боя по @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченному} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемому} вами существу.

Этот @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удар} наносит [[/r 1d6]] Доп.Урона за каждую Кость Урона оружия и имеет следующие дополнительные эффекты:

Успех: Цель падает @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Ничком}

Провал: Вы теряете хватку цели и она больше не @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схвачен} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаем} вами.

Крит.Провал: Вы теряете хватку цели и свое равновесие. Вы падаете @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Ничком} и цель больше не @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схвачен} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаем} вами.

entries.name: Спинолом
entries.description:
Требования: У вас есть @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченное} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемое} существо

Вы сжимаете своего врага в яростных медвежьих объятиях, оказывая сильное давление на его нервы, суставы или другие болевые точки.

Совершите проверки @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.i95kcGLIQKOTsnv6]{Атлетики} для @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Захвата} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченного} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемого} вами существа, со следующими эффектами вместо обычных.

Крит.Успех: Цель @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Неуклюжа 2} до конца своего след.хода и @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Неуклюжа 1} на 1 минуту

Успех: Цель @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Неуклюжа 1} до конца своего след.хода.

entries.name: Непреодолимая Хватка
entries.description:
Ваша хватка обладает сверхъестественным свойством, не позволяя вашим врагам легко выкрутиться, с магической помощью или без нее.

♦ Если @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченное} вами существо пытается использовать телепортационное заклинание или эффект, оно должно совершить успешную @Check[type:flat|dc:15|showDC:all], иначе заклинание проваливается.

♦ Если @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченное} вами существо попытается @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Вырваться}, находясь под действием @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Свобода Перемещений}, то оно должно совершить успешную @Check[type:flat|dc:15|showDC:all], иначе будет вынуждено кидать попытку @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Вырваться} обычным способом, а не преуспевая автоматически.

entries.name: Блокировать Форму
entries.description:
Ваше умение манипулировать телом врага настолько сильно, что вы можете рвать и разрушать альтернативные формы.

Совершите проверку @Check[type:athletics], чтобы @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.mmfWcV3Iyql5nzTo]{Противодействовать} эффекту полиморфа, действующего на @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Схваченное} или @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Сдерживаемое} вами существо.

Если цель каким-то образом находится под действием нескольких эффектов полиморфа, то вы можете выбрать какому из них противодействовать; если отдельные эффекты неочевидны, то Мастер выбирает случайным образом.

После этого цель временно иммунна на 1 день.

entries.name: Посвящение Гуля
entries.description:
Вы стали жертвой лихорадки гуля, умерли и вернулись в виде гуля - нежити, проклятой нескончаемым голодом к мертвой плоти, который постепенно берет верх над разумом и силой воли, пока вы не будете готовы на все ради желанной еды. В дополнение к изменениям личности меняется и ваше тело. Ваши уши становятся заостренными, а кожа приобретает синевато-бледный оттенок. Ногти становятся когтями, зубы - острыми как бритва, готовыми отрывать плоть от кости, а язык - длинным и заостренным.

♦ Вы получаете признаки гуль и нежить и @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.SAbzItAI4uwbdnQk]{Основные Преим.Нежити}.

♦ Ваша жажда нежити - плоть мертвых существ; свежеумершие трупы разумных существ удовлетворяют вашу жажду гораздо лучше, чем трупы неразумных или гнилые трупы, но любое мертвое существо может утолить голод хотя бы ненадолго.

♦ Вы получаете 2 безоружные атаки относящиеся к группе драка.

  1. Когти: [[/r 1d4]] Рубящ.урон (быстрое,@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.dnbUao9yk8Bs99eT#tochnoe-(finesse)]{Точное})
  2. Челюсти: [[/r 1d6]] Колющ.Урон (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.dnbUao9yk8Bs99eT#tochnoe-(finesse)]{Точное}).

♦ Вы получаете действие @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1If9lLVoZdO8woVg]. Удовлетворить свою тягу трудно. Поедание Плоти временно утоляет её. Многие способности гуля обладают дополнительными умениями или функциями, которые могут быть использованы когда вы сыты, однако их использование также лишает вас состояния сытости. Вы всегда можете Поесть плоти, но поедание больше обычного не дает какого-либо эффекта; голод гуля либо удовлетворен, либо нет.

Особенность: Вы не можете выбрать другую способность посвящения, пока не получите 2 другие способности из @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.bKoV037XO3qiakGw]{Архетип: Гуль}.

entries.name: Восстанавливающее Поедание
entries.description:
Когда вы пожираете трупы и утоляете свой голод, то еще восстанавливаетесь от некоторых из своих ран; ваша некротическая синяя плоть почти мгновенно срастается, как только вы начинаете запихивать куски мертвячины себе в глотку.

Раз в 10 минут, когда вы используете @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1If9lLVoZdO8woVg], вы восстанавливаете [[/r (ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[Healing]]]{1d6 ОЗ} за каждые свои 2 уровня, округленные до большего.

entries.name: Стремительный Прыжок
entries.description:
Ваша физиология нежити позволяет вам быстро прыгать к оппоненту или от него.

Вы @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Прыгаете}. Это движение не провоцирует 5реакции.

Если вы сыты, то на свой выбор можете окончить сытость и вместо этого сделать @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{Прыжок в Высоту} или @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Прыжок в Длину} не провоцируя 5реакции, так как вы совершаете быстрый грандиозный прыжок прежде чем кто-либо из врагов может среагировать на него.

entries.name: Фермент Лихорадки
entries.description:
Ваши когти и клыки выделяют инфекционный фермент, родственный некротическим эффектам лихорадки гуля, из-за которого раны существа медленно заживают.

@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Ударьте} вашими когтями или челюстями. Вместо нормального типа урона, эта атака наносит негатив.урон; при попадании, до начала вашего след.хода, цель получает только половину от любого исцеления. Сама цель или находящий рядом союзник может потратить 2действия Взаимодействовать , чтобы выдавить фермент из раны и убрать этот эффект.

Если вы сыты, то на свой выбор можете окончить сытость и усилить фермент, увеличивая продолжительность до 1 минуты.

entries.name: Могильная Сила
entries.description:
Плоть, которую вы поглотили за время своего существования в качестве гуля, сделала вас сильнее, наделив странными познаниями из разумов пожираемых вами разумных существ и приблизив вас к состоянию совершенства нежити.

♦ Вы получаете @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.YGk41WV42aTM7CQV]{Продвинутые Преимущества Нежити}.

♦ Дополнительно, когда сыты, вы получаете бонус состояния +5 фт к своей Скорости.

entries.name: Парализующий Порез
entries.description:
Ваши ферменты могут парализовать врага, а не просто затруднить им заживление ран.

@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Ударьте} вашими Когтями или Челюстями. Если вы попали по живому существу не являющемуся эльфом, оно должно совершить успешный @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC)|showDC:all]{Спас.СТК} против вашего КС Класса/КС Закл. (в зависимости от того, что больше) иначе будет @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Парализован}.

Независимо от результата спасброска, это существо временно иммунно к Парал.Порезу на 24 часа.

Существо становящееся @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Парализован} может совершить новый @Check[type:fortitude]{Спас} для завершения паралича в конце каждого своего хода и за каждый такой Спас. КС суммарно снижается на 1.

entries.name: Тошнотворный Укус
entries.description:
Ваша слюна вызывает у живых существ сильную тошноту и легкий жар, ослабляя их, чтобы вам было легче с ними разделаться.

Когда вы наносите крит.успешное попадание Челюстями, существо получает @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Тошнота 1}. Это эффект болезни.

Если вы сыты, то можете окончить сытость, чтобы дать цели @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Тошнота 1} при обычном попадании.

entries.name: Обжорство Плотью
entries.description:
Вы развили способность накапливать в своем исхудалом теле больше плоти, чтобы дольше оставаться сытым.

♦ Если вы @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1If9lLVoZdO8woVg] когда сыты, то становитесь полностью сыты (далее сыты 2).

♦ Вы остаетесь сыты 2 на 3 часа, после чего становитесь сыты на 1 час.

♦ Если вы сыты 2 когда умение закончит вашу сытость, то вы перестаете быть сыты 2 и остаетесь просто сыты.

♦ Если у вас есть @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7GrACprIxZuarGDs], вы получаете бонус состояния +10 фт к Скорости когда сыты 2, вместо бонуса состояния +5 фт когда просто сыты.

entries.name: Трупная Вонь
entries.description:
Ваше тело источает сильный запах разложения в @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Аура}@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10}, настолько гнилостный, что он вызывает тошноту у всех, кто находится на этом расстоянии.

Любое существо начинающее свой ход в этой @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Ауре} должно совершить успешный @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC)|showDC:all]{Спас.СТК} против вашего КС Класса/КС Закл. (в зависимости от того, что больше) иначе получит @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Тошнота 1} (+ @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Замедлен 1} при крит.провале).

Находясь в этой @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Ауре} существо = @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.wX9L6fbqVMLP05hn]{Получает} штраф Обстоятельства -2 к Спас. против болезни и к восстановлению от этого состояния тошноты.

Существо совершившее успешный спас. временно иммунно к Трупной вони на 1 минуту.

entries.name: Able Ritualist
entries.description: Your readings on rituals make you a skilled participant. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to primary and secondary checks you attempt as part of casting a ritual.

entries.name: Absorb Spell
entries.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger You critically succeed at a saving throw against a foe's spell, and that spell is of a level you can normally cast.

You absorb a spell and store it in your body. If you are a spontaneous spellcaster, you can cast the triggering spell once during the next 10 minutes, even if it's not on your spell list as if it were in your repertoire. If you are a prepared spellcaster, you can replace one of your prepared spells of the same level with the absorbed spell, but you must cast the absorbed spell within 10 minutes or you lose that spell slot for the day. You cast the spell at the same spell level as the spell you absorbed, but the spell is of your magical tradition and uses your spell DC, spell attack roll, and other statistics to determine its effects.

entries.name: Abundant Step
entries.description: You can teleport yourself a short distance. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Az3PmWnlWSb5ELX9]{Abundant Step} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

entries.name: Accelerating Touch
entries.description:
Your healing energies are infused with bounding energy. A creature that recovers Hit Points from your @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} gains a +10-foot status bonus to its Speed until the end of its next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.alyNtkHLNnt98Ewz]{Spell Effect: Accelerating Touch}

entries.name: Acclimatization
entries.description:
Your time spent in the hostile parts of the world has inured you to extreme climates.

In your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain}, you gain resistance equal to half your level to all environmental damage and are affected by temperature effects as though they were one step less severe (incredible heat or cold becomes extreme, extreme heat or cold becomes severe, and so on).

When other creatures @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tfa4Sh7wcxCEqL29]{Follow the Expert} with you as a guide in your favored terrain, they too treat temperature effects as one step less severe.

entries.name: Accompany
entries.description:
Trigger An ally within 30 feet @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Casts a Spell}.

You use your performances to supplement an ally's spellcasting, providing magical energy for their spells.

Attempt a Performance check, using a very high DC for the ally's level (Core Rulebook 503-504), and either spend a Focus Point (if the triggering spell is a focus spell) or expend a spell slot at least 1 level higher than the triggering spell. If you succeed at the Performance check, your ally's spell doesn't cost the Focus Point or spell slot.

entries.name: Accurate Flurry
entries.description:
Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand.

You refine the precision of your unbelievable storm of blows.

When you perform an @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OqHfUQQorVBkx34j]{Impossible Flurry}, your first attack with each weapon instead takes the multiple attack penalty as though you had already made one attack this turn. All subsequent attacks take the maximum multiple attack penalty, as though you had already made two or more attacks this turn.

entries.name: Accurate Swing
entries.description: You strike cleanly with wide, sweeping attacks to inflict maximum damage, taking advantage of your judged foe's fear to land a felling blow. If you Strike a creature you condemned with Harsh Judgment that has the frightened condition with a sweep melee weapon or a sweep unarmed attack, you gain a circumstance bonus to the Strike's damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice your weapon deals.

entries.name: Accursed Clay Fist
entries.description:
You have replaced one of your forearms with one made of clay and infused with cursed arcane magic. When you make an unarmed Strike with your clay fist and hit, your target takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against curse effects for 1 hour.

Special The damage die for your clay fist is 1d8, and it loses the agile and finesse traits of a typical fist.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.bvk5rwYSoTtz8QGf]{Effect: Accursed Clay Fist}

entries.name: Achaekek's Grip
entries.description: You sense if a creature you have slain in the last year has been restored to life, as long as you and that creature are on the same plane. You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IT1aaqDBAISlHDUV]{Achaekek's Clutch} focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by praying to Achaekek or researching your assigned kill.

entries.name: Приобретенная Устойчивость
entries.description:
Небольшое количество яда, принимаемое в несмертельных дозах, может помочь организму повысить сопротивляемость к более смертоносной дозе.

Триггер: Вы проваливаете Спас. против яд

Перебросьте спровоцировавшую проверку и используйте второй результат.

Как только вы используете Приобретенную Устойчивость, в этот день, вы можете продолжить использовать ее снова против того же яд, но не можете использовать против другого яд, пока не сделаете свои Ежедн.Приготов..

entries.name: Adaptive Mask Familiar
entries.description: Your mask familiar adapts quickly to material form, allowing it to gain more familiar and master abilities. You select four master and familiar abilities each day instead of two.

entries.name: Additional Companion
entries.description:
Another animal joins you in your travels. It is a young animal companion that has the minion trait. See Beastmaster Animal Companions (in Beastmaster Dedication) for rules on how having multiple animal companions works.

Special You can select this feat more than once, gaining an additional animal companion each time, to a maximum of four total companions (including the one you gained from Beastmaster Dedication and possibly one you gained from sources other than the beastmaster archetype).

entries.name: Additional Recollection
entries.description:
Trigger You succeed or critically succeed at a check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{Recall Knowledge} on your hunted prey.

You scan the battlefield quickly, remembering critical details about multiple opponents you face. You immediately attempt a check to Recall Knowledge about a different creature you can perceive.

entries.name: Additional Shadow Magic
entries.description: Choose an additional shadowdancer focus spell you haven't already selected from Shadow Magic. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.

entries.name: Advanced Arcana
entries.description:
You gain one wizard feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your wizard level is equal to half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another wizard feat.

entries.name: Advanced Blood Potency
entries.description:
You gain one sorcerer feat. For the purpose of prerequisites, your sorcerer level is half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you do, you gain another sorcerer feat.

entries.name: Advanced Bloodline
entries.description: You have studied your bloodline to learn the secrets of its magic. You gain the advanced bloodline spell associated with your bloodline. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

entries.name: Advanced Bow Training
entries.description: Through constant practice and the crucible of experience, you increase your skill with advanced bows. You gain proficiency with all advanced bows as if they were martial weapons in the bow weapon group.

entries.name: Advanced Breakthrough
entries.description:
You gain one inventor feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your inventor level is equal to half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another inventor feat.

entries.name: Advanced Construct Companion
entries.description: You've upgraded your construct companion's power and decision-making ability. It becomes an advanced construct companion. During an encounter, even if you don't use the Command a Minion action, your construct companion can still use 1 action on your turn that round to Stride or Strike.

entries.name: Advanced Deduction
entries.description:
You gain one investigator feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your investigator level is equal to half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another investigator feat.

entries.name: Advanced Deity's Domain
entries.description: Through your conviction, you have glimpsed the deeper secrets of your deity's domain. You gain an advanced domain spell from the domain you chose with Deity's Domain. You can cast that spell as a devotion spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

entries.name: Advanced Dogma
entries.description:
You gain one cleric feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your cleric level is equal to half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another cleric feat.

entries.name: Advanced Domain
entries.description:
Your studies or prayers have unlocked deeper secrets of your deity's domain. You gain an advanced domain spell from one of your domains. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Special You can select this feat multiple times. Each time, you must select a different advanced domain spell from a domain for which you have an initial domain spell.

entries.name: Advanced Elemental Spell
entries.description:
Your connection to one of the great elemental aspects of nature deepens, allowing you further control over its powers.

You gain the advanced order spell associated with your order:

  • if you're a member of the flame order, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Z3kJty995FkrsZRb]{Combustion};
  • if you're a member of the stone order, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ECApRjIIxD0JogOa]{Stone Lance};
  • if you're a member of the storm order, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.v4QHuVOhFD1JMAqu]{Powerful Inhalation};
  • if you're a member of the wave order, you gain @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.E80SrXuBdZViPGiH]{Pulverizing Cascade}.

Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

entries.name: Продвинутый Талант
entries.description:
Вы получаете 1 способность сорвиголовы. С целью соответствия ее Пред.Услов., ваш уровень сорвиголовы равен половине уровня персонажа.

Особенность: Вы можете выбрать эту способность более одного раза. Каждый раз, выбирая ее, вы получаете другую способность сорвиголовы.

entries.name: Улучшенная Ярость
entries.description:
Вы получаете 1 способность варвара. С целью соответствия Пред.Услов., ваш уровень варвара равен половине уровня персонажа.

Особенность: Вы можете выбрать эту способность более одного раза. Каждый раз, выбирая ее, вы получаете другую способность варвара.

entries.name: Улучшенный Охотничий Трюк
entries.description:
Вы получаете 1 способность рейнджера. С целью соответствия ее Пред.Услов., ваш уровень рейнджера равен половине уровня персонажа.

Особенность:Вы можете выбрать эту способность более одного раза. Каждый раз, выбирая ее, вы получаете другую способность рейнджера.

entries.name: Улучшенная Ката
entries.description:
Вы получаете 1 способность монаха. С целью соответствия ее Пред.Услов., ваш уровень монаха равен половине уровня персонажа.

Особенность:Вы можете выбрать эту способность более одного раза. Каждый раз, выбирая ее, вы получаете другую способность монаха.

entries.name: Advanced Martial Magic
entries.description:
You gain one magus feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your magus level is equal to half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another magus feat.

entries.name: Advanced Muse's Whispers
entries.description:
You gain one bard feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your bard level is equal to half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another bard feat.

entries.name: Advanced Order Training
entries.description: You gain the greater order benefit for the Hellknight order to which you belong.

entries.name: Advanced Red Mantis Magic
entries.description:
Your Red Mantis magical training has improved. Add two 2nd-level spells to your Red Mantis assassin spellbook. You gain a 2nd-level spell slot that you can use to prepare a spell from your Red Mantis assassin spellbook.

At 8th level, add two 3rd-level spells to your Red Mantis assassin spellbook. You gain a 3rd-level spell slot that you can use to prepare a spell from your Red Mantis assassin spellbook.

At 10th level, add two 4th-level spells to your Red Mantis assassin spellbook. You gain a 4th-level spell slot that you can use to prepare a spell from your Red Mantis assassin spellbook.

entries.name: Продвинутое Откровение
entries.description: Вы изучаете продвинутое заклинание-откровение связанное с вашим таинством. Увеличьте запас Очков Фокусировки на 1.

entries.name: Улучшенное Заклинание Школы
entries.description:
Вы получаете доступ к новому мощному заклинанию школы, в зависимости от вашей арканной школы:

  • Преграждение - @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LoBjvguamA12iyW0]{Поглощение Энергии}
  • Воплощение - @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zjG6NncHyAKqSF7m]{Пространственные Шаги}
  • Прорицание - @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4LSf04FFvDgMyDk6]{Бдительный Глаз}
  • Очарование - @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KPGGkyBFbKse7KpK]{Аура Ужаса}
  • Эвокация - @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vfHr1N8Rf2bBpdgn]{Стихийная Буря}
  • Иллюзии - @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Nun72GTmb31YqSKh]{Покров Невидимости}
  • Некромантия - @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zvvHOQV78WKUB33l]{Течение Жизни}
  • Трансмутация - @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Меняющаяся Форма}

Увеличьте запас Очков Фокусировки на 1.

entries.name: Advanced Seeker of Truths
entries.description:
You have unlocked deeper secrets to uncovering and hoarding lore. You gain an advanced domain spell from one domain you selected with Seeker of Truths. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Special You can take this feat up to three times, each time selecting a different advanced domain spell from a domain you selected with Seeker of Truths.

entries.name: Advanced Shooting
entries.description:
You gain one gunslinger feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your gunslinger level is equal to half your level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another gunslinger feat.

entries.name: Advanced Synergy
entries.description:
You gain one summoner feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your summoner level is equal to half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another summoner feat.

entries.name: Продвинутая Уловка
entries.description:
Вы получаете 1 способность плута. С целью соответствия ее Пред.Услов., ваш уровень плута равен половине уровня персонажа.

Особенность:Вы можете выбрать эту способность более одного раза. Каждый раз, выбирая ее, вы получаете другую способность плута.

entries.name: Advanced Weaponry
entries.description:
Your eidolon's attack evolves.

Choose one of your eidolon's starting melee unarmed attacks. It gains one of the following traits, chosen when you gain the feat: disarm, grapple, nonlethal, shove, trip, or versatile bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing.

entries.name: Advanced Wilding
entries.description:
You gain one druid feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your druid level is equal to half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another druid feat.

entries.name: Advanced Witchcraft
entries.description:
You gain one witch feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your witch level is equal to half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another witch feat.

entries.name: Aegis of Arnisant
entries.description:
Requirements You are wielding a shield.

Inspired by the tale of Arnisant, you transform your shield into a magic ward. Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.S9PZFOVe7zhORkUc]{Absorb into the Aegis} reaction.

entries.name: Aeon Resonance
entries.description:
You gain the resonant power of one embedded aeon stone as if it were placed in a wayfinder. While you can embed multiple aeon stones in your flesh, you can gain the resonance power from only one embedded stone at a time, selected each day when you make your daily preparations.

Special At 8th level, you can take this feat again. If you do, you gain the resonance powers of up to four invested aeon stones instead of only one.

entries.name: Affliction Mercy
entries.description:
The divine grace that flows through you grants reprieve from an affliction.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zilwynzk8lIujgZo]{Mercy}, you can instead attempt to counteract a curse, disease, or poison.

entries.name: Agile Hand
entries.description: When you cast mage hand, you can modify its target to be a set of thieves' tools. When you Cast the Spell in this way, the tools move up to 20 feet towards a device or lock. After you Sustain the Spell on future turns, you can use the tools to attempt Thievery checks to Disable a Device or Pick a Lock within the spell's range, but you take a -2 penalty to your Thievery check. If you critically fail, the spell ends and you can't use this modification again for 24 hours.

entries.name: Agile Maneuvers
entries.description: You easily maneuver against your foes. Your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} actions have a lower multiple attack penalty: -4 instead of -5 if they're the second attack on your turn, or -8 instead of -10 if they're the third or subsequent attack on your turn.

entries.name: Airborne Form
entries.description: Your eidolon can fly. It gains a fly Speed equal to its Speed.

entries.name: Ретивое Поведение
entries.description: Ваш эйдолон двигается быстрее. Он получает бонус Состояния +10ФТ к своей Скорости.

entries.name: Alchemical Discoveries
entries.description:
You've devoted extra time in the lab to improve your knowledge of alchemy. You learn the formulas for two alchemical items each time you level up instead of one; these must still be elixirs or tools.

The number of versatile vials you can create each day increases by 1 if you're an expert in Crafting, 2 if you're a master, or 3 if you're legendary.

entries.name: Aldori Duelist Dedication
entries.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.cnsq5cXgQu4FXnoZ]{Aldori Duelist}

Access You are from the Broken Lands region.

Your Aldori duelist training teaches you martial techniques and increases your dedication to the Aldori dueling sword. You become trained in your choice of Acrobatics or Athletics and in Dueling Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Whenever your proficiency rank in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency rank with Aldori dueling swords. You gain access to @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.iSceAVMkVv1uKK7t]{Aldori Dueling Sword}

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Aldori Duelist archetype.

entries.name: Aldori Parry
entries.description:
Requirements You are wielding only an Aldori dueling sword and have your other hand or hands free.

You can parry attacks against you with your Aldori dueling sword. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn as long as you continue to meet the requirement.

entries.name: Aldori Riposte
entries.description:
Requirements You are benefiting from Aldori Parry.

Trigger An opponent within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.

You riposte with your @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.iSceAVMkVv1uKK7t]{Aldori Dueling Sword} when your enemy leaves an opening. Make a melee Strike or use a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} action against the triggering opponent using your Aldori dueling sword.

entries.name: Align Armament
entries.description:
Frequency once per round

You bring a weapon into metaphysical concordance with your deity's beliefs. When you select this feat, choose chaotic, evil, good, or lawful. Your choice must match one of your deity's alignment components. This action has the trait corresponding to the chosen alignment component.

When you use this action, you touch a weapon. For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 damage of the chosen type to creatures of the opposed alignment. For example, if you chose good, the weapon would deal an extra 1d6 good damage to evil creatures. If you Align an Armament again, any previously aligned armament loses its additional damage.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.XC3dRbwfu35vuvmM]{Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.eA14bUF7xhNCzw2v]{Effect: Align Armament (Evil)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.bl4HXm1e4NQ0iJs5]{Effect: Align Armament (Good)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.KkbFlNfcQQUfSVXd]{Effect: Align Armament (Lawful)}

Special You can select this feat a second time, choosing your deity's other alignment component. When you Align an Armament, you can choose either alignment component.

entries.name: Align Ki
entries.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} that has the monk trait.

The power of your ki soothes your wounds and energizes you for battle. You regain Hit Points equal to your level plus your Wisdom modifier.

entries.name: All In My Head
entries.description:
Trigger You would take damage from a Strike or spell that doesn't have the death trait or otherwise cause instant death (such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate}).

Using your occult connections and incredible powers of persuasion, you convince yourself that the triggering damage is a figment of your imagination.

The damage changes from its usual damage type to mental damage, and the damaging effect gains the nonlethal trait. You can't use this reaction if you are immune to mental effects or mental damage.

entries.id: All the Time in the World
entries.name: All the Time in the World
entries.description:
Frequency once per hour

Your firsthand experience of the subjective nature of time and space has given you new observational insights. Your mind processes information so quickly that time appears to stop for all creatures but you. You can take up to 9 actions in 3 sets of up to 3 actions each. During this time, you can use purely mental and observational abilities such as Recall Knowledge, Seek, and Devise a Stratagem, and you can use an action to move a mental projection of yourself to a location within a 60- foot radius to observe objects more closely and from different angles, though you can't affect your surroundings in any way (for instance, you could move your mental projection more closely to a distant door to read a minute inscription on its handle, but you could not open it to observe the other side). When the duration elapses, time resumes its normal flow.

entries.name: Ambushing Knockdown
entries.description:
Access Side with the Washboard Dogs in the gang conflict.

Requirements You're wielding a melee weapon that deals bludgeoning damage and you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by an enemy.

You emerge from hiding and deliver a blow that can knock an enemy sprawling to the ground. You Stride up to half your Speed, but you must end your movement next to a foe you're hidden from or undetected by. You then Strike that enemy with the required weapon; if you hit, the target is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

entries.name: Amphibious Form
entries.description: Your eidolon adapts to life on land and underwater. It gains the amphibious trait, allowing it to breathe in water and air and to avoid the normal -2 penalty for making bludgeoning and slashing unarmed Strikes underwater. It gains a swim Speed equal to its land Speed or 25 feet, whichever is less; or if it is normally aquatic, it gains a land Speed equal to its swim Speed or 25 feet, whichever is less.

entries.name: Amplifying Touch
entries.description:
Your healing energies empower attacks.

An ally that recovers Hit Points from your @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} gains a +1 status bonus to their attack rolls and deals 1 additional good damage on all their Strikes until the end of their next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.MjtPtndJx31q2N9R]{Spell Effect: Amplifying Touch}

entries.name: Analyze Idiolect
entries.description:
You break down a specific individual's idiolect, memorizing their speech mannerisms and habits.

If you interact with someone for at least 10 minutes, when you later attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} that individual, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your Deception checks and DCs. Due to the intense character study required, you can't remember more than one idiolect at a time.

entries.name: Анализировать Уязвимость
entries.description:
Ваше знание физиологии существа и понимание тактики помогает вам атаковать с предельной точностью.

Требования: Вы должны идентифицировать существо с помощью @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Вспомнить Информацию}

Вы тщательно изучаете существо, которое вы идентифицировали, чтобы выявить особенно слабые места его физической формы или расположения.

Следующий раз, до окончания своего хода, когда вы @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Ударом} наносите выбранному существу урон @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.j1JE61quDxdge4mg]{Внезапной Атаки}, добавьте дополнительные [[/r 2d6]] точного урона.

Если ваш Доп.Урон от @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.j1JE61quDxdge4mg]{Внезапной Атаки} увеличивается на 11-м и 17-м уровнях, то увеличьте Доп.Урон от Анализировать Уязвимость до [[/r 3d6]] на 11-м уровне и [[/r 4d6]] на 17-м.

entries.name: Ancestral Mage
entries.description: The magic of your ancestry and bloodline are one and the same. Add any innate spells you have from a heritage or an ancestry feat to your spell repertoire, meaning you can cast them using your spell slots.

entries.name: Anchoring Aura
entries.description:
Requirements Fiendsbane Oath

Your aura hampers fiends' teleportation. Your aura attempts to counteract teleportation spells cast by fiends within 15 feet, using the spell level and DC of your devotion spells.

entries.name: Angel Of Death
entries.description:
All your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes }against a creature you have @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.orjJjLdm4XNAcFi8]{Marked for Death} have the death trait, causing the mark to be instantly killed when reduced to 0 Hit Points.

When killed in this way, attempts to communicate with it, return it to life, turn it into an undead, or otherwise disturb its afterlife fail unless the effect's counteract level is higher than half your level when you killed the creature (rounded up), or originates from an artifact or a deity.

entries.name: Animal Feature
entries.description: You are so connected with the animal world that you can grant yourself an animal's features and abilities. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{Animal Feature} warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

entries.name: Animal Trainer Dedication
entries.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.kisnuKPMGheORROU]{Animal Trainer}

You gain the services of a young animal companion that travels with you and obeys simple commands as best as it can. This trained animal is trained in Performance instead of the skill listed for its type.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the animal trainer archetype.

entries.name: Animate Net
entries.description: When you cast animate rope, you can modify its target to be 1 net. If you do, replace the spell's standard effects with the following: You cause a net to animate and throw itself at a Medium or smaller creature within 20 feet of the net. Attempt a spell attack roll against the target's Reflex DC. On a success, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it Escapes; on a critical success, it's also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it Escapes. The Escape DC is equal to your spell DC as long as the spell lasts. Once the spell ends, the Escape DC returns to the normal DC for a net (usually 16), and a creature adjacent to the target can Interact to remove the net.

entries.name: Annotate Composition
entries.description:
By putting composition to paper, you can create a source of stirring words or song that others can read and understand.

You spend 10 minutes and 1 Focus Point to transpose a composition spell on a special scroll that you or another creature can later activate. This composition spell must take a single action to cast. If the chosen composition spell requires a Performance check as part of the casting, the GM rolls this check as a secret check when you annotate your score.

If you have @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kF0rs9mCPvJGfAZE]{Inspire Heroics} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.irTdhxTixU9u9YUm]{Lingering Composition} and the chosen composition spell allows, you can also use one of those spells to modify the annotated composition, with the GM rolling the secret Performance check. If you do, you spend an additional Focus Point, even if the secret check fails.

Any creature that can read the language you used when annotating your composition can Activate the Item by spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait. This produces the effects of the composition as though the activating creature had @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}.

A composition you create this way loses its power the next time you make your daily preparations. While the composition is in your possession, you can render it inert using a single action that has the concentrate trait. You can't regain the Focus Points you spent to create the annotated composition until it is activated or loses its magic.

entries.name: Предугадать Засаду
entries.description:
Используя свои обширные знания тактик засады, двигаясь с половиной вашей Скорости путешествия, вы высматриваете любых спрятанных существ или опасные места.

Если вы Предугадываете Засаду в начале столкновения, то бросаете проверку Восприятия для инициативы, а все враги бросающие для инициативы Скрытность получают к своим проверкам штраф Обстоятельства -2.

entries.name: Apex Companion
entries.description: You can call upon the essence of every individual animal of a particular species to temporarily transform your animal into an exemplar of its kind. You learn the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qqQYrXaRJXr7uc4i]{Apex Companion} order spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

entries.name: Arcane Breadth
entries.description: You can cast more arcane spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from wizard archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell slots.

entries.name: Arcane Evolution
entries.description:
Your arcane legacy grants you an exceptional aptitude for intellectual and academic pursuits. You become trained in one skill of your choice.

Additionally, you keep a book of arcane spells similar to a wizard's spellbook. You add all the spells in your spell repertoire to this book for free, and you can add additional arcane spells to the book by paying the appropriate cost and using your Arcana skill, similarly to how a wizard can Learn Spells to add those spells to his spellbook.

During your daily preparations, choose any one spell from your book of arcane spells. If it isn't in your spell repertoire, add it to your spell repertoire until the next time you prepare. If it's already in your spell repertoire, add it as an additional signature spell for that day.

entries.name: Arcane School Spell
entries.description: Select one arcane school of magic. You gain the school's initial school spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by studying.

entries.name: Arcane Sensitivity
entries.description: You can sense the presence of the supernatural, even if you don't have any magical ability yourself. You can spend a single action (this action has the concentrate trait) to determine if any magical auras are present in the area. This has the effects of a 1st-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} spell but isn't magical. By straining, you can also discover the source of the magic and its school (with the effect of a 4th-level detect magic spell), but doing so prevents you from using this ability again until you've rested for 8 hours.

entries.name: Arcane Shroud
entries.description:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to Cast a Spell from a spell slot or make a Spellstrike with a spell from a spell slot.

Your spell has a powerful aftereffect, briefly granting you a certain spell depending on the spell you cast. You use Arcane Cascade and are subject to an additional aftereffect spell depending on the school of your most recent spell. This aftereffect spell's duration lasts until the end of your next turn or its normal duration, whichever is longer. Using Arcane Shroud again ends any existing spell you gained from Arcane Shroud.

  • Abjuration @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Stoneskin}
  • Conjuration @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zR67Rt3UMHKC5evy]{Blink}
  • Divination @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility}
  • Enchantment @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KqvqNAfGIE5a9wSv]{Heroism}
  • Evocation @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YrzBLPLd3r9m6t1p]{Fire Shield}
  • Illusion @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} (ends after a hostile action, as normal)
  • Necromancy @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8ViwItUgwT4lOvvb]{False Life}
  • Transmutation @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aEM2cttJ2eYcLssW]{Fleet Step}

entries.name: Archaeologist Dedication
entries.description:
You are a student of peoples and their histories, and are in constant pursuit of knowledge and artifacts from the past. You become an expert in Society and Thievery, and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} about ancient history, peoples, and cultures.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the archaeologist archetype.

entries.name: Archaeologist's Luck
entries.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You fail a check against a trap, such as a Thievery check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable} the trap or a Reflex save to avoid its effects.

You are more than just skillful; your drive to find the secrets of the past manifests as a strange kind of luck. Reroll the failed check and use the new result.

entries.name: Archaeologist's Warning
entries.description:
Trigger You are about to roll a Perception, Society, or Thievery check for initiative.

You visually or audibly warn your companions of danger, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls. Depending on whether you use gestures or call out, this free action gains either the visual or auditory trait.

entries.name: Archer Dedication
entries.description:
You become trained in all simple and martial weapons in the bow weapon group. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in all simple and martial weapons in the bow weapon group. If you are at least an expert in the bow you are using, you gain access to the critical specialization effect with that bow.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the archer archetype.

entries.name: Archer's Aim
entries.description: You slow down, focus, and take a careful shot. Make a ranged Strike with a weapon in the bow weapon group. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignore the target's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition. If the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, reduce the flat check from being hidden from 11 to 5.

entries.name: Могущество Архимага
entries.description:
Вы в совершенстве постигли секреты арканной магии.

Вы получаете дополнительный Слот Заклинания 10-го уровня.

entries.name: Ardent Armiger
entries.description:
Archetype Hellknight Armiger

You have been trained to resist the manipulations of fiends, and your Hellknight discipline makes you difficult to influence. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against mental effects that specifically improve your attitude and to your Will DC against someone Coercing you, Demoralizing you, Making an Impression on you, or Making a Request of you.

If a mental effect would compel you to act in a way that violates your Hellknight order's tenets (as determined by the GM), you can attempt to break free from the effect as a reaction triggered by receiving the violating order, and you gain a new Will save against the effect. You can attempt this new save only once for a given effect, even if you are compelled to violate your order's tenets multiple times.

entries.name: Armiger's Mobility
entries.description: You've learned how best to move in heavy armor. When wearing heavy armor, if you meet the Strength requirement, instead of reducing the movement penalty by 5 feet, you reduce the penalty by 10 feet (typically reducing the penalty to 0). If you are a dwarf with the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C1R4wd6G46CAVIn7]{Unburdened Iron} feat, increase your Speed by 5 feet.

entries.name: Armor Rune Shifter
entries.description: You learn the secrets of armor runes by viewing them through gems and can alter them at your discretion. Once per day when you make your daily preparations, you can focus on a rune's magical energies through a crystal's facets to alter a single property rune on one suit of armor in your possession to suppress its normal effects and make it function as a different property rune. You can temporarily alter the rune to function as one of the following runes: energy-resistant, fortification, glamered, invisibility, shadow, or slick. The property rune remains altered until you make your next daily preparations. The armor must meet the prerequisites for the temporary rune, and any other runes that required the suppressed rune are also suppressed while the rune is transformed. The rune is obviously altered, and thus the armor can't be sold as though it had the temporary rune.

entries.name: Специалист по Доспехам
entries.description:
Вы упорно тренировались, чтобы оптимизировать защитные свойства своего доспеха.

♦ Вы получаете Эффекты специализации доспеха для средних и тяжелых доспехов.

entries.name: Armored Exercise
entries.description: You've spent time training in your armor alongside other agents from the Swords. Your proficiency rank for light, medium, and heavy armor increases to expert for whichever of those you already had the trained proficiency rank in.

entries.name: Дать Отпор Доспехом
entries.description:
Триггер: враг находящийся рядом, критически проваливает бросок атаки, чтобы @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Ударить} вас оружием ближнего боя или безоружной атакой
Требования: На вас надет средний доспех или более тяжелый

Эффект: Вы отражаете слабые атаки своим доспехом, отбрасывая врага назад. Совершите проверку Атлетики, чтобы @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Толкнуть} спровоцировавшего врага, даже если у вас нет свободной руки.

В случае Успеха, вы не можете сделать @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Перемещение}, чтобы следовать за врагом, так как вы отбрасываетеВрага обратно отраженной атакой, а не физически приближаясь к нему.

entries.name: Armored Rest
entries.description: You've slept many nights in your armor and gotten used to it. You can sleep in armor overnight without being fatigued the next day. If you were already fatigued before sleeping, the armor doesn't prevent you from recovering from being fatigued.

entries.name: Arrow Snatching
entries.description: You pluck missiles from the air and hurl them back at their source. When you successfully deflect an attack with @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgaqlDFTVC7Ryurt]{Deflect Arrow}, as part of that reaction, you can immediately make a ranged Strike against the attacker using the projectile you deflected. This is a thrown weapon with the same range increment and effect on a hit as the triggering attack.

entries.name: Arrow of Death
entries.description:
Frequency once per day

You modify an arrow or bolt to bring death to your target in a single potent hit. Make a bow Strike. On a hit, you deal an additional [[/r 10d10]] precision damage. On a critical hit, the target must also succeed at a Fortitude saving throw against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or be immediately slain; this save has the death and incapacitation traits.

entries.name: Artillerist Dedication
entries.description:
Artillery is a team sport, where every member of the crew has to rely on the other members. At best, a mistake might just waste time. At worst, a misaligned fuse or a badly set pin could cause the whole thing to explode. You've taken these lessons to heart, and so your presence on an artillery team assists the entire team at every aspect of the siege weapon's deployment and usage. If you're serving on a siege weapon crew, you and all other members gain a +2 circumstance bonus to any checks to Load, Aim, move, or Repair the weapon. When you Aim a siege weapon, you can move the weapon's aim twice as far as normal.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained at least two other feats from the artillerist archetype.

entries.name: Assassin Dedication
entries.description:
You've trained to assassinate your foes, and you do so with tenacity and precision. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.orjJjLdm4XNAcFi8]{Mark for Death} activity.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the assassin archetype.

entries.name: Assassinate
entries.description:
Requirements You have designated a mark using @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.orjJjLdm4XNAcFi8]{Mark for Death} and are completely unnoticed by your mark.

You Strike with one swift movement, trying to instantly slay your mark. Make a Strike against your mark. If you hit, your mark takes [[/r 6d6[precision]]]{6d6 extra precision damage} with a basic Fortitude save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. If the mark critically fails, they die. This is an incapacitation effect. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to your Assassinate for 1 day.

entries.name: Assured Knowledge
entries.description:
You can procure information with confidence. Whenever you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{Recall Knowledge} using any skill (including Bardic Lore), you can forgo rolling your check to instead receive a result of 10 + your proficiency bonus (don't apply any other bonuses, penalties, or modifiers).

As long as you are an expert in a skill, you meet the prerequisites for the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.H3I2X0f7v4EzwxuN]{Automatic Knowledge} skill feat in that skill, even if you don't have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Assurance} in that skill.

entries.name: Astonishing Explosion
entries.description:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger You use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.NlEZ0piDxg9buXCL]{Quick Alchemy} to craft an alchemical bomb that deals splash damage and is at least 2 levels lower than your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy} level.

Your bomb incorporates an explosive spark of wonder that leaves witnesses dumbfounded. Any target hit by your Strike with the bomb is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} by you for 1 round. On a critical success, the target is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

entries.name: Возможность для Атаки (Воин)
entries.description: @Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

entries.name: Attuned Stride
entries.description: You can move freely through terrain you're attuned to. When you gain a terrain attunement benefit, you ignore difficult terrain in the corresponding type of terrain until the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Attunement Shift
entries.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Requirements Your previous action was to cast a spell with the air, cold, earth, fire, plant, or water trait.

The magic of your spell floods into you, overriding your connection to the land around you. You alter your terrain attunement to a terrain that matches a trait of the spell you just cast. You thereby gain your terrain attunement benefit when you cast further spells with the same descriptor, instead of using the terrain you're actually in. For instance, if you cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Tanglefoot}, your terrain attunement switches to your choice of forest or swamp, and your terrain attunement applies when you cast another plant spell.

Your terrain attunement reverts to that of the terrain you're in 1 minute after you use Attunement Shift.

entries.name: Attunement to Stone
entries.description: You become attuned to the stone around you. When in contact with a stone surface, you gain tremorsense (imprecise) 5 feet along that surface, and you can activate your ka stone to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]{Meld into Stone}.

entries.name: Aura Of Despair
entries.description:
Your presence as an avatar of evil makes your foes more susceptible to terror and makes it almost impossible for them to shake off fear when you are near.

Enemies within 15 feet of you take a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against fear. In addition, an enemy that ends its turn within 15 feet of you can't reduce the value of its @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition below 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.MNkIxAishE22TqL3]{Effect: Aura of Despair}

entries.name: Aura Of Preservation
entries.description:
Your aura protects against the twisting powers of aberrations. You and all allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saves against effects from aberrations.

You also gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saves against morph or polymorph effects and Will saves against mental effects; this bonus increases to +2 against aberrations' morph, polymorph, or mental effects.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.18FHJoazfEmgNkfk]{Effect: Aura of Preservation}

entries.name: Aura of Courage
entries.description: You stand strong in the face of danger and inspire your allies to do the same. Whenever you become frightened, reduce the condition value by 1 (to a minimum of 0). At the end of your turn when you would reduce your frightened condition value by 1, you also reduce the value by 1 for all allies within 15 feet.

entries.name: Aura of Faith
entries.description:
You radiate an aura of pure belief that imbues your attacks and those of nearby allies with holy power.

Your Strikes deal an extra 1 good damage against evil creatures. Also, each good-aligned ally within 15 feet gains this benefit on their first Strike that hits an evil creature each round.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.VOOShYoB4gTopZtg]{Effect: Aura of Faith}

entries.name: Aura of Life
entries.description:
Your aura protects against necromantic effects. You and all allies within 15 feet gain resistance 5 to negative energy and a +1 status bonus to saves against necromancy effects.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.FPuICuxBLiDaEbDX]{Effect: Aura of Life}

entries.name: Aura of Righteousness
entries.description: Your righteous aura dampens evil's might. You and all allies within 15 feet gain evil resistance 5.

entries.name: Aura of Unbreakable Virtue
entries.description: You are a paragon of all that is good, your overwhelming aura causing evildoers to cower. All evil creatures within 15 feet of you take a -1 status penalty to checks and DCs that target you or your allies. This penalty is -2 against creatures you have taken an oath against (such as dragons if you have the Dragonslayer Oath feat). You can choose to suppress or resume this aura as an action, which has the concentrate trait.

entries.name: Aura of Vengeance
entries.description: When you call upon others to take retribution, you also guide their aim. When you use Retributive Strike, your allies who make Strikes take only a -2 penalty, instead of a -5 penalty.

entries.name: Auspicious Mount
entries.description: Guided by your ongoing care, your steed has developed incredible intelligence and skill. The mount you gained through the divine ally class feature is now a specialized animal companion. You can select one of the usual specializations or the auspice specialization. Auspice mounts gain the following benefits: Your companion is marked by your deity's religious symbol as a sacred creature of your deity. Its proficiency rank in Religion increases to expert, it can speak the language associated with your deity's servitors (Celestial for champions who follow the tenets of good), and its Intelligence modifier increases by 2 and its Wisdom modifier by 1.

entries.name: Avalanche Strike
entries.description:
Requirements You are wielding a melee weapon in two hands.

You attack all nearby adversaries. Make a melee Strike with the required weapon against each enemy within your melee reach. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but don't increase your penalty until you have made all your attacks.

entries.name: Avatar's Audience
entries.description: Your extensive service has made you a lesser herald of your deity, which affords you certain privileges. First, any creature you encounter knows instinctively that you speak for your deity. Second, if you conduct the commune ritual to contact your deity, you don't have to pay any cost and you automatically get a critical success. Third, once per day, you can cast plane shift as a divine innate spell, but only to travel to the realm of your deity. When you cast it this way, its casting time is 1 minute, your religious symbol is a sufficient tuning fork for this spell, and you appear exactly where you want to be. If you're in your deity's realm due to this spell, you can return to the point you left when you cast it by spending a single action, which has the concentrate and divine traits.

entries.name: Axe Climber
entries.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.VRUYc3QyRjjOjppc]{Turpin Rowe Lumberjack}

When you are climbing a wooden surface and have a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Hatchet} or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.War0uyLBx1jA0Ge7]{Battle Axe} in each hand, you have a climb Speed equal to half your normal Speed. You must still have both legs available to climb and can't use either of the axes in combat while climbing. This feat can also be used to climb a surface of ice if you have a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.RbM4HvPyrZ4YJxRc]{Light Pick} in each hand.

entries.name: Axe Thrower
entries.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.VRUYc3QyRjjOjppc]{Turpin Rowe Lumberjack}

You have mastered the weight and balance of a variety of axes and can lob them with ease. Any one-handed axe weapon you wield has the thrown trait with a range of 10 feet. For axes that already have the thrown trait, the range increases by 10 feet. When you critically succeed at an attack roll with a thrown axe weapon, you apply the axe's critical specialization effect.

entries.name: Banishing Blow
entries.description:
Trigger You use your champion's reaction, triggered by a fiend within your reach.

The erratic teleportation magic you experienced in the Kortos Mounts has taught you a few tricks. You attempt an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the fiend that triggered your champion's reaction; on a success, the target can't teleport or summon creatures for 1 minute. On a critical success, the target is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} and can't teleport or summon creatures for 1 hour, and if you are on your home plane and the target is a fiend of level 18 or lower from another plane, it is also banished to its home plane. Your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this attack.

entries.name: Banshee Cry Display
entries.description: You've learned how to pull off a sudden noisemaker at just the right moment in your display, a technique that can disrupt precise wording. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.b3h3QqvwS5fnaiu1]{Banshee Cry} fireworks display.

entries.name: Посвящение Варвара
entries.description:
♦ Вы становитесь ОБУЧЕН Атлетике;

Если вы уже были ОБУЧЕН Атлетика, то становитесь ОБУЧЕН навыку на свой выбор.

♦ Вы становитесь ОБУЧЕН КС Варвара.

♦ Вы можете использовать действие @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9]{Ярость}.

♦ выберите @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.dU7xRpg4kFd01hwZ]{Инстинкт}, как если бы вы были варваром. У вас есть этот инстинкт для всех целей и вы становитесь связаны его анафемой, но не получаете любые другие даваемые им возможности.

Особенность:Вы не можете выбрать другую способность посвящения, пока не получите 2 другие способности из архетипа варвара.

entries.name: Варварская Стойкость
entries.description:
Вы получаете дополнительные 3 ОЗ за каждую имеющуюся у вас классовую способность архетипа варвара.

По мере продолжения получения классовых способностей архетипа варвара, вы продолжаете получать дополнительные ОЗ таким способом.

entries.name: Bard Dedication
entries.description:
You cast spells like a bard and gain the Cast a Spell activity. You gain a spell repertoire with two common cantrips from the occult spell list, or any other cantrips you learn or discover. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells. Your key spellcasting ability for bard archetype spells is Charisma, and they are occult bard spells. You become trained in Occultism and Performance; for each of these skills in which you were already trained, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. Choose a muse as you would if you were a bard. You have that muse for all purposes, allowing you to take that muse's feats, but you don't gain any of the other abilities it grants.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the bard archetype.

entries.name: Barrier Shield
entries.description: When you cast shield, you can modify the spell to create a solid barrier you can use for cover, but not for blocking. You can't use the Shield Block reaction when the spell is modified in this way, but you (and only you) can spend an action to Take Cover to gain standard cover from it.

entries.name: Basic Arcana
entries.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level wizard feat of your choice.

entries.name: Basic Bard Spellcasting
entries.description: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from the bard archetype, add a common occult spell or another spell you learned or discovered to your repertoire, of the appropriate spell level.

entries.name: Basic Beast Gunner Spellcasting
entries.description: You've unlocked the first secrets of beast guns, granting you the power of their synergistic magic. You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from this archetype, add a spell of the appropriate spell level to your repertoire, either a common spell of your chosen tradition or another spell of that tradition you've learned or discovered.

entries.name: Basic Blood Potency
entries.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level sorcerer feat.

entries.name: Basic Bloodline Spell
entries.description: You gain your bloodline's initial bloodline spell. If you don't already have one, you also gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus without any special effort.

entries.name: Basic Breakthrough
entries.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level inventor feat of your choice.

entries.name: Basic Captivator Spellcasting
entries.description: Your innate ability to fascinate others develops into full-fledged spellcasting. This spellcasting comes naturally and instinctively to you, rather than as a product of training. Choose a 1st-level occult spell from either the enchantment or illusion school. You can Cast this Spell as an occult innate spell. At 6th level, you gain a 2nd-level spell, and at 8th level, you gain a 3rd-level spell. Each of these spells must be from either the enchantment or illusion school.

entries.name: Basic Cleric Spellcasting
entries.description: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. You can prepare your deity's spells in your spell slots of the appropriate level from the cleric archetype.

entries.name: Basic Deduction
entries.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level investigator feat of your choice.

entries.name: Basic Dogma
entries.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level cleric feat.

entries.name: Basic Druid Spellcasting
entries.description: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

entries.name: Basic Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
entries.description: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from this archetype, add a spell of the appropriate spell level to your repertoire, either a common spell of your chosen tradition or another spell of that tradition you have learned or discovered.

entries.name: Основной Талант
entries.description: Вы получаете способность сорвиголовы 1-го или 2-го уровня.

entries.name: Основная Ярость
entries.description: Вы получаете способность варвара 1-го или 2-го уровня.

entries.name: Простой Охотничий Трюк
entries.description: Вы получаете способность рейнджера 1-го или 2-го уровня.

entries.name: Основная Ката
entries.description: Вы получаете способность монаха 1-го или 2-го уровня.

entries.name: Basic Lesson
entries.description: Your patron grants you a special lesson, revealing a hidden facet of its nature. Choose a Basic Lesson. You gain its associated hex, and your familiar learns the associated spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

entries.name: Basic Magus Spellcasting
entries.description: You gain the basic bounded spellcasting benefits.

entries.name: Basic Martial Magic
entries.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level magus feat of your choice.

entries.name: Basic Modification
entries.description: You've learned to modify your innovation in order to enhance its capabilities beyond what an ordinary piece of equipment can accomplish. You gain a basic modification of your choice for your innovation. Your innovation must meet any requirements for the modification you choose, as normal.

entries.name: Basic Muse's Whispers
entries.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level bard feat.

entries.name: Basic Red Mantis Magic
entries.description:
You have learned limited divine magic from your Red Mantis training. You gain the Cast a Spell activity. You're a prepared spellcaster, able to prepare two cantrips and one 1st-level spell each day. You prepare these spells from a Red Mantis assassin spellbook, similar to a wizard's, containing three cantrips and two 1st-level spells.
