Requirements You are in @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C3MgEkPNaIhTddbr]{Peafowl Stance}.

You slowly move across the battlefield with dangerous grace. Step twice and then Strike. The Strike must be made with the sword required by Peafowl Stance.

entries.name: Peculiar Anatomy
entries.description:
Your circulatory system contains viscous protoplasmic fluid instead of ordinary blood. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against disease and poison, and resistance to poison damage equal to half your level.

In addition, your resistance to precision damage from Disturbing Defense increases to an amount equal to 7 + your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype, and the DC of your flat checks to recover from is 8 rather than 13.

entries.name: Peer Beyond
entries.description:
You have uncanny insight into the way ghosts and haunts manifest, manipulate the mind, and rejuvenate. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against mental effects caused by incorporeal undead and haunts, and you can roll a Spirit Lore or Haunt Lore check for initiative if you know that an incorporeal undead or a haunt is present.

If you are present when a spirit or haunt is defeated, you instantly gain a flash of insight into how it can be permanently put to rest. Typically, this flash manifests as a vision that presents a quick scene closely linked to the source of the spirit or haunt's creation. Attempt a Spirit Lore or Haunt Lore check, respectively, with a DC appropriate for the spirit or haunt's level. On a success, you gain a hint about how to put the spirit to rest or permanently disable the haunt; on a critical success, you learn the exact method of doing so.

entries.name: Penetrating Fire
entries.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.

You blast a bullet through one foe and into another. Choose two targets, one of which would give the other lesser cover against your ranged attacks. Make a single ranged Strike with the required weapon against both targets. This attack ignores any lesser cover the nearer target provides the other. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature you hit. Penetrating Fire counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty.

entries.name: Penetrating Shot
entries.description:
Requirements You are wielding a ranged weapon

You shoot clear through an intervening creature to hit your prey. Choose a target that is giving lesser cover to your hunted prey. Make a single ranged Strike with the required weapon against the chosen target and your hunted prey. This attack ignores any lesser cover the chosen target provides your hunted prey. Roll damage only once, and apply it to each creature you hit. A Penetrating Shot counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty.

entries.name: Perfect Debilitation
entries.description:
You have perfected the formulas for bombs that impede your enemies.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sv4LeEbkOJyLen10]{Debilitating Bomb}, your target avoids the condition the bomb imposes only if it critically succeeds at its saving throw.

entries.name: Perfect Distraction
entries.description:
You use clever tactics to mislead your foes as you sneak away. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} while leaving a decoy behind.

The decoy acts as the spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WPXzPl7YbMEIGWfi]{Mislead}, though you aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, just @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}. You can continue to concentrate to move your decoy, as with the spell, whether or not you remain @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} throughout the duration.

Once you use Perfect Distraction, you need to spend 10 minutes to set up another decoy before you can use it again.

entries.name: Perfect Encore
entries.description: You develop another incredible creation. You gain an additional 10th-level spell slot.

entries.name: Perfect Finisher
entries.description: You focus your panache into an impeccable assault. Make a Strike, rolling the attack roll twice and using the better result.

entries.name: Perfect Form Control
entries.description: Thanks to magic and muscle memory, you can stay in your alternate forms indefinitely; you may have even forgotten your original form. When you use Form Control, instead of lasting 1 hour, wild shape is permanent until you Dismiss it.

entries.name: Perfect Ki Adept
entries.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.JiRqSMv1STETLwSP]{Student of Perfection}

You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VBNevVovTCpn04vL]{Unblinking Flame Revelation} for Unblinking Flame, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ytboJsyZEbE1MLeV]{Unbreaking Wave Advance} for Unbreaking Waves, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tvO6Kmc2pQve9DC5]{Unfolding Wind Rush} for Unfolding Wind, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FPnkOYyWIaOzkmqn]{Untwisting Iron Buffer} for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

entries.name: Perfect Mutagen
entries.description: You have enhanced the formulas for your mutagens, aligning them perfectly to your physiology. When under the effect of a mutagen you crafted, you do not suffer its drawback.

entries.name: Perfect Readiness
entries.description: You prepare to fire with an instinctive speed and muscle memory that go beyond your conscious thoughts. You're permanently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}. You can use your extra action only to Step or Interact to reload.

entries.name: Perfect Shot
entries.description:
Requirements You are wielding a loaded ranged weapon with reload 1 or more, and you have not reloaded your weapon since your last turn

After watching the motions of combat with incredible intensity and precision, you fire at your prey at the perfect moment to deliver maximum pain. Make a ranged Strike with the required weapon against your hunted prey. If you hit, the Strike deals maximum damage. After the Strike, your turn ends.

entries.name: Perfect Strike
entries.description:
Archetpe @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.JiRqSMv1STETLwSP]{Student of Perfection}

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GQopUYTuhmtb7WMG]{Perfect Strike} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

entries.name: Путь Совершенства (Стойкость)
entries.description: Ваше мастерство Стойкости увеличивается с ЭКСПЕРТ до МАСТЕР.

entries.name: Путь Совершенства (Рефлекс)
entries.description: Ваше мастерство Рефлексов увеличивается с ЭКСПЕРТ до МАСТЕР.

entries.name: Путь Совершенства (Воля)
entries.description: Ваше мастерство Воли увеличивается с ЭКСПЕРТ до МАСТЕР.

entries.name: Performance Weapon Expert
entries.description: Your experience has made you better with a wide variety of weapons. Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons and martial weapons increase to expert, as does your proficiency rank for your chosen advanced weapon.

entries.name: Performative Weapons Training
entries.description:
You're skilled with flashy weapons. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hMYdSFmMWzidzHih]{Bo Staff}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DA3HgyEBGEbtRNOo]{Dueling Cape}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zi9ovfoRp2fMhfpO]{Spiked Chain}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.VitLIpdIAmKlGb7i]{Sword Cane}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.f1gwoTkf3Nn0v3PN]{Whip}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the weapons listed.

entries.name: Perpetual Scout
entries.description:
You spot anything out of place in the areas you know best. While in your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain}, you always gain the benefits of the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kV3XM0YJeS2KCSOb]{Scout} exploration activity, even if you are performing another exploration activity.

If you're legendary in Survival, you gain these benefits in any terrain.

entries.name: Persistent Boost
entries.description: Your innovation sets foes on fire, covers them in acid, leaves barbed thorns behind, or otherwise deals persistent damage to your foes that sticks around long after you deliver your boosted attack. When you or your construct innovation damage a foe with offensive boost, that foe also takes [[/r 1d8[persistent]]]{1d8} of the same damage type as the offensive boost damage.

entries.name: Persistent Creation
entries.description: You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TUj8eugNqAvB1vVR]{Creation} as an innate spell at will, choosing whether it is arcane or primal each time. The created object lasts until you spend 1 hour not within its immediate vicinity or until it is destroyed. Such objects are called persistent creations. If you cast creation again, any persistent creation you previously created with the spell immediately disintegrates.

entries.name: Persistent Mutagen
entries.description: You've trained your physical form to remain stable within the a given altered state. Once per day, when you consume an alchemical item with the infused and mutagen traits, you can retain its effects until the next time you make your daily preparations instead of its normal duration.

entries.name: Pesh Skin
entries.description:
Requirements You are transformed into a plant by a polymorph spell.

Your plant form sprouts hundreds of spines, and your blood causes mild hallucinations in creatures exposed to it. Each time a creature touches you, hits you with an unarmed attack, or hits you with a melee weapon attack while adjacent to you, that creature takes 1d6 piercing damage. Increase the damage to 2d6 if the polymorph spell is 8th level or higher, or to 3d6 if it's 10th level.

When an adjacent creature damages you with piercing or slashing damage, it must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or become stupefied 1 (or stupefied 2 on a critical failure) until the end of its next turn.

These benefits last until you're no longer polymorphed into a plant.

entries.name: Phase Arrow
entries.description:
Frequency once per day

You can concentrate an immense amount of magic to create a piece of ammunition that phases through everything but your target.

Make a bow Strike against a foe who is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to you (but not @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}).

The ammunition travels to your target in a straight line, passing through any non-magical barriers or walls in its way, though magical barriers stop the arrow. The shot ignores all cover, the concealed condition, the hidden condition, and circumstance bonuses to AC from shields. It has a +4 status bonus to hit creatures wearing any type of armor.

The Strike's damage can't be reduced with a @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction using a non-magical shield.

entries.name: Phase Bullet
entries.description:
Frequency once per day

You can aim your bullets not just in three normal dimensions, but in additional dimensions as well, allowing you to fire a magical shot that phases through everything but your target. Make a crossbow or firearm Strike against a foe who's observed or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to you (but not undetected). The ammunition travels to your target in a straight line, passing through any non-magical barriers or walls in its way, though magical barriers and force effects stop the bullet. The shot ignores all cover, the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition, the hidden condition, and circumstance bonuses to AC from shields. It has a +4 status bonus to hit creatures wearing any type of armor. The Strike's damage can't be reduced with a Shield Block reaction using a non-magical shield.

entries.name: Phase Out
entries.description:
Your eidolon phases out of reality slightly, gaining resistance to all damage (except force and negative) equal to half your level. It's not incorporeal, but it can't use Strikes or actions that require a fully physical form, such as @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}.

Your eidolon can return to its normal form with a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

entries.name: Phenom's Verve
entries.description: You're possessed with an incredibly vivacious spark that separates you not only from ordinary gun users and gunslingers, but even from other phenoms. Using that distinctive verve, when you perform impeccably and control the scene with your abilities, you also manage to set up your foes for disaster and ensure they remain in your sights for any follow-up attacks you want to make against them. If you critically succeed at a Performance check for Pistol Twirl or a pistol phenom archetype feat, you gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with one-handed firearms and one-handed melee weapons until the end of your turn.

entries.name: Phonetic Training
entries.description: You can pronounce and repeat words with near-perfect accuracy even if you don't understand their meaning, and you can write them down in a phonetic script that allows you or another creature with Phonetic Training to read it later. Even if the words are in a language with sound you can't pronounce, you can faithfully transcribe them. Memorizing long sequences of words remains just as difficult as it is normally.

entries.name: Physical Training
entries.description: You spend a lot of time focusing on your physical fitness. You increase your proficiency rank in Acrobatics and Athletics from expert to master.

entries.name: Piercing Critical
entries.description: Your attacks with your preferred weapons deal especially devastating wounds. When you Strike with a firearm or crossbow for which you have legendary proficiency, you critically succeed if you roll a 19 on the die, as long as that result is a success.

entries.name: Pin to the Spot
entries.description: You Strike a target within reach. If you hit and deal damage, the target is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} as if you had critically succeeded at an Athletics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}.

entries.name: Pinning Fire
entries.description:
Trigger You use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Flurry of Blows} to make two ranged piercing weapon Strikes against the same target.

You target your opponent's clothing, equipment, or loose flesh with piercing projectiles to pin them to the ground or a nearby surface.

If both your attacks hit, the target must succeed at a Reflex save against your class DC or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it or an adjacent creature succeeds at a DC 10 Athletics check to remove the pinning projectiles.

The creature doesn't become stuck if it is incorporeal, is liquid (like a water elemental or some oozes), or could otherwise escape without effort.

entries.name: Pirate Dedication
entries.description:
As a pirate, you sail the seas in search of enemy ships to plunder. You become trained in Sailing Lore, or become an expert in it if you were already trained.

You ignore the effects of difficult terrain or uneven ground caused by a ship's movement. Additionally, you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.vZltxwRNvF5khf9a]{Boarding Assault} action.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the pirate archetype.

entries.name: Pirate Weapon Training
entries.description:
You're particularly skilled at wielding traditional pirate weapons. You become trained with the following weapons: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Hatchet}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tH5GirEy7YB3ZgCk]{Rapier}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{Scimitar}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.f1gwoTkf3Nn0v3PN]{Whip}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency with a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank for these weapons.

entries.name: Pistol Phenom Dedication
entries.description:
You catch an opponent off-guard by spinning your weapon. You gain the Pistol Twirl gunslinger feat, enabling you to Feint against creatures within your weapon's first range increment. This otherwise serves as Pistol Twirl for the purpose of meeting prerequisites, although as normal, it doesn't count as another pistol phenom feat for the purpose of meeting Pistol Phenom Dedication's special entry and taking another archetype. Whenever you Feint with a one-handed firearm, you can choose to attempt a Performance check instead of a Deception check.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained at least two other feats from the pistol phenom archetype.

entries.name: Piston Punch
entries.description: You lash out with a powerful punch, extending your dynamo to a greater length in order to attack two creatures in a row. Make a single bludgeoning or piercing dynamo Strike and compare the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes. The first foe must be within your melee reach and the second foe must be adjacent to the first foe in a straight line away from you. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature you hit. A Piston Punch counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty. Reduce the operational time of your sterling dynamo by 1 hour.

entries.name: Pivot Strike
entries.description:
Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.XZwGLLgC1sIKlR1c]{Staff Acrobat}

Requirements You are wielding your staff.

You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} and then Strike using your staff. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage for the Strike equal to twice the number of weapon damage dice. Regardless of whether your Strike hit, you can then attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the target.

entries.name: Plant Shape
entries.description:
You can take the form of a plant creature.

Add the forms listed in @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form} to your wild shape list; if you don't have wild shape, you can instead cast plant form once per day, heightened to the same level as your highest-level druid spell slot.

Whenever you're polymorphed into another form using wild shape, you gain resistance 5 to poison.

entries.name: Play To The Crowd
entries.description:
Trigger You reduce an enemy to 0 Hit Points during a non-trivial combat encounter with spectators.

You show off for the crowd. Attempt a Performance check; the DC is determined by the GM but is typically the standard DC for your level or the DC to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on the spectators, whichever is higher. On a success, choose one of the following benefits; on a critical success, choose two benefits:

  • A number of temporary Hit Points equal to your character level; these last for 1 minute.
  • A +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.
  • A +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll before the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Plentiful Snares
entries.description: You can prepare incredible numbers of snares each day out of simple ingredients. Double the number of prepared snares granted by Snarecrafter Dedication.

entries.name: Plot The Future
entries.description:
You spend 10 minutes in contemplation to uncannily predict how events will play out. Choose a particular goal or activity you plan to engage in within 1 week, or an event you expect might happen within 1 week. You analyze whether it's likely to come to pass, learning whether it's highly likely, somewhat likely, somewhat unlikely, or highly unlikely. You also gain a piece of advice suggesting a course of action you or your allies could take that might make the chosen event more or less likely, whichever you prefer.

The GM determines the likeliness of the event and the piece of advice you learn.

entries.name: Plum Deluge
entries.description:
Requirements You have at least three of the same contact poison.

You have learned to saturate an area with poison in imitation of the techniques of your rival, Blue Viper. As part of this ability, you Interact to draw three vials of the same contact poison and throw them in the air, where they shatter and spread a poisonous deluge affecting a 20-foot burst within 60 feet. All creatures in the burst are automatically exposed to the poison, immediately bypassing any onset time, and must attempt a saving throw against that poison. The three vials must be identical, even if the poison can come in multiple types or different levels.

entries.name: Отравленный Плащ
entries.description:
В природе некоторые животные покрыты ядовитыми шипами, так что даже прикосновение к ним смертельно.

Триггер: Существо рядом с вами попадает по вам безоружным @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Ударом} ближнего боя
Требования: Вы подготовили свою одежду, чтобы отравить атакующего

Чтобы использовать эту 5реакцию, вы должны нанести яд на одежду или вплести острые отравленные иглы в ткань одежды. Это занимает 10 минут и использует одну дозу яд с признаком контакт или ранение. Одновременно, вы можете иметь только 1 такой яд внедренный в одежду.

Когда вы используете эту 5реакцию, спровоцировавшее существо подвергается внедренному яду.

entries.name: Отравленное Оружие
entries.description:
Требования: Вы владеете колющим или рубящим оружием

Вы используете яд на требуемое оружие; если у вас есть свободная рука, то как часть этого действия вы можете @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Взаимодействовать}, чтобы достать яд.

Если до конца вашего след.хода, ваша следующая атака этим оружием попадает и наносит урон, то эффект яда применяется к цели, при условии, что яд может быть использован при контакте или ранении. Если вы критически проваливаете атаку, то яд как обычно тратится.

Особенность: Во время ваших дневных приготовлений, вы можете подготовить простых ядов применяемых к ранениям, в количестве, равном вашим уровням плута. Эти яды наносят 1d4 урона ядом. Только вы можете правильно использовать эти яды, и они приходят в негодность при следующем ежедневном приготовлении.

▲ @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.SXYcrnGzWCuj8zq7]{Effect: Poison Weapon}

entries.name: Посвящение Отравителя
entries.description:
Вы всегда должны иметь под рукой несколько токсинов - никогда не знаешь, когда может оказаться полезным какой-нибудь мышьяк или что-то подобное.

♦ Вы получаете основные преимущества алхимии, в том числе получая способность навыка @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Алхимическое Ремесло}, однако они применяются только к алхим.ядам.

♦ Вы получаете порции @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{Насыщенных Реагентов} на день, в количестве, равном вашему уровню.

♦ Ваш уровень @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Продвинутая Алхимия} для их создания равен 1 и не увеличивается сам по себе.

Особенность: Вы не можете выбрать другую способность посвящения, пока не получите 2 другие способности из архетипа отравителя.

entries.name: Сноровка Отравителя
entries.description:
Яды поражают определенные части тела: один яд может поражать легкие, другой систему кровообращения, а третий нервную систему. Вы знаете как получать преимущества от таких слабостей.

Требования: Ваше последнее действие было успешный @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удар} ближнего боя, который нанес урон цели, на которую действует яд, и вы знаете какой яд

Вы наносите цели [[/r {1d6}]]{1d6 Доп.Урона} того же типа, что и от требуемого @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Удара}, и [[/r 1d6[poison]]]{1d6 Яда}.

Если вы хотя бы 18-го уровня, то наносите [[/r 2d6]]{2d6} каждого типа.

entries.name: Polearm Tricks
entries.description: Your connection to rune magic has revealed tricks to make polearms deadlier in your hands. You gain the critical specialization effects of polearms.

entries.name: Поразительное Заклинание
entries.description:
Ваше сотворение заклинаний изобилует странными огнями, эзотерическими жестами и другими захватывающими эффектами, которые сбивают с толку ваших врагов.

Если ваше следующее действие - @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Сотворение Заклинания}, то любое существо, которое пытается использовать 5реакцию спровоцированную вашей активностью @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Сотворение Заклинания}, получает штраф Обстоятельства -2 к броскам атаки и проверкам навыков бросаемым как часть этой реакции.

Дополнительно, если заклинание включает атаку заклинанием или осуществление спасброска, то существа по которым вы попали или которые провалили свои спасброски, получают состояние @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Заворожен} на вас, до начала вашего след.хода.

entries.name: Posse
entries.description:
Requirements You have designated prey with @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey}.

By spending 1 minute giving guidance to help hunt down your prey, you instruct up to five willing creatures to assist you. They gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} your prey, to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} your prey, and to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Gather Information} about your prey. You and the creatures assisting you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls when entering combat with your prey.

This benefit lasts until you designate a new prey or your prey dies, whichever comes first. An individual creature assisting you loses this benefit if they're out of your presence for too long to benefit from your instructions. This is usually 1 hour, but is determined by the GM.

entries.name: Подготовка Припарки
entries.description:
Когда вы создаете травяной эликсир, то вместо этого можете приготовить его как припарку.

Припарка получает признак масло (но остается алхимическим, а не магическим) и теряет признаки эликсир.

Вы можете применить припарку действием @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Взаимодействовать} одной рукой. Когда вы применяете припарку, в дополнение к обычным эффектам предмета, получатель может сразу сделать чистую проверку, чтобы восстановиться от одного источника @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Прод.Урон} кислотой, Кровотеч. или огнем, со снижением КС за счет соответствующей помощи.

entries.name: Крутой Занос
entries.description:
Вы отправляете машину в едва контролируемый занос, резко поворачиваете, чтобы уйти от преследования или пустить в ход оружие.

Требования: Вы пилотируете транспорт

Вы @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.uS3qDAgOkZ7b8ERL]{Едите} со штрафом -2 к вашей проверке пилотирования, получая эффекты действия Ехать за то же количество действий, которое вы потратили на Крутой Занос.

В конце этого движения, в случае Успеха, вы можете повернуть транспортное средство на вплоть до 90 градусов. В случае Крит.Успеха проверки пилотирования, вы вместо этого можете развернуть транспортное средство на 180 градусов.

entries.name: Powerful Snares
entries.description: Your snares are particularly difficult for enemies to avoid. When you set a snare, the saving throw DC for that snare is equal to its normal DC or your class DC, whichever is higher.

entries.name: Powerful Sneak
entries.description: You have learned to exploit your enemies' lowered defenses. When you succeed or critically succeed at a Strike using your Strength modifier on the attack roll and you would deal sneak attack damage, you can change the additional damage from sneak attack into ordinary damage of the same type as your Strike, rather than precision damage.

entries.name: Practiced Defender
entries.description: After extensive practice with the Swords, you're comfortable enough with your shield to move at a normal pace with it raised. You may use the Defend exploration activity while traveling at your full travel speed instead of half your travel speed.

entries.name: Practiced Guidance
entries.description: Making one's way to safety can be harrowing, but you have extensive practice at helping others along that path. When you roll a success to Aid a member of your crop, you get a critical success instead.

entries.name: Practiced Reloads
entries.description: You've mastered the reloading techniques and methods usually practiced by only the most dedicated firearm professionals. You gain the slinger's reload for the way you selected with Gunslinger's Dedication.

entries.name: Prayer Attack
entries.description:
Requirements You are wielding a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wkzxLpSe7LN6c5Ld]{Sawtooth Saber} in each hand.

You've mastered the signature assassination style of the Red Mantis. Attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} an enemy within 30 feet. If your Feint is successful, when you use Prayer Attack on subsequent turns you automatically make the target flat-footed against your melee attacks for that turn without rolling a check to Feint, so as long as you remain visible to the target and the target remains within 30 feet of you. If you use your Prayer Attack against a different target, you must attempt to Feint the target normally.

When you use Prayer Attack, your next successful Strike with a sawtooth saber that turn deals @Localize[PF2E.PD.Bleed.2d6] to the target.

entries.name: Precious Arrow
entries.description:
You enchant a piece of ammunition with the magical essence of a precious material, allowing you to leverage certain creatures' weaknesses.

Choose cold iron or silver; if you shoot the arrow before the end of your turn, it counts as that material. At 14th level, add adamantine to the list of materials you can choose from.

entries.name: Precious Munitions
entries.description: You mix flecks of precious materials you've gathered on your journeys into your custom bullets to bring out those properties in your temporary ammunition. You can use advanced alchemy to create standard-grade adamantine, cold iron, or silver ammunition, spending 1 batch of reagents per piece of ammunition. At 15th level, you can create high‑grade adamantine, cold iron, or silver ammunition.

entries.name: Precise Debilitations
entries.description:
You carefully aim and gracefully deliver your debilitations. Add the following debilitations to the list you can choose from when you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}.

  • Debilitation The target takes an additional [[/r 2d6[precision]]]{2d6 precision damage} from your attacks.
  • Debilitation The target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}.

entries.name: Precise Finisher
entries.description: Even when your foe avoids your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.K878asDgf1EF0B9S]{Confident Finisher}, you can still hit a vital spot. On a failure with Confident Finisher, you apply your full precise strike damage instead of half.

entries.name: Предсказуемо!
entries.description:
Наблюдая за врагом, вы можете понять его следующий ход и устоять или подготовить что-то в ответ.

Выберите одну цель и сделайте проверку @Check[type:perception]{Восприятия}, чтобы @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Понять Намерение} с КС ОбманаВрага или трудным КС по уровнюВрага, в зависимости от того, что выше.

Крит.Успех: Вы точно понимаете стратегию цели, до начала вашего след.хода получая бонус Обстоятельства +2 к КБ против существа, и бонус Обстоятельства +2 к вашему следующему спасброску против существа, тоже до начала вашего след.хода.

▲ Эффект: @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.5v0ndPPMfZwhiVZF]{Effect: Predictable!}

Успех: Вы делаете вывод о сути стратегии цели; как Крит.Успех, но лишь с бонусом Обстоятельства +1.

Провал: Вы не можете распознать стратегию цели и не получаете никакого преимущества.

Критический Провал: Вы неправильно понимаете стратегию цели, до начала вашего след.хода получая штраф Обстоятельства -1 к КБ против существа, и штраф Обстоятельства -1 к вашему следующему спасброску против существа, тоже до начала вашего след.хода.

▲ Эффект: @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.KgR1myc4OLzVxfxn]{Effect: Predictable! (Critical Failure)}

entries.name: Predictive Purchase (Investigator)
entries.description:
You have just the thing for the situation. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Prescient Planner} and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lHFz4MmebvPqTb0A]{Prescient Consumable} feats.

When using Prescient Planner, you can pull out the item as a 2-action activity to remove your backpack (or a similar container) and draw the item, rather than taking 1 minute.

entries.name: Предусмотрительная Покупка (Плут)
entries.description:
Вы каким-то образом умудряетесь иметь именно то, что нужно в данной ситуации.

Вы получаете способности @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Дальновидный Планировщик} и @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lHFz4MmebvPqTb0A]{Предусмотрительный Расходник}. Когда используете @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Дальновидный Планировщик}, то можете достать из рюкзака (или подобного контейнера) предмет активностью в 2 2действия, вместо 1 минуты.

entries.name: Предотвращающее Предостережение
entries.description:
Ваше божество дает вам небольшое прозрение, предупреждая вас об опасностях сразу до того как они случатся.

Триггер: Вы совершаете Спас. против опасности, но еще не сделали бросок

Преимущество: Вы получаете бонус Обстоятельства +2 к спровоцировавшему спасброску.

entries.name: Premonition Of Clarity
entries.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You fail a saving throw against a mental effect.

Your deity sends you a vision of faith to steel you against mental attacks. Reroll the triggering saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus. You must use the second result, even if it's worse.

entries.name: Preparation
entries.description: You survey the battlefield, calculating the possibilities. You gain one additional reaction, which you can use before the beginning of your next turn for any rogue reaction.

entries.name: Preternatural Parry
entries.description:
Trigger You're targeted by a Strike or a spell attack roll, or you're about to roll a saving throw against a spell effect.

Requirements You have one or more hands free.

You snap your weapon or limb into place to ward off harm at the last second. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against the triggering effect until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Prevailing Position
entries.description:
Trigger You are targeted by an attack or attempt a Reflex saving throw against a damaging effect, and you are in a stance.

Your willingness to flow from one stance to another lets you sacrifice their benefits to better protect yourself.

You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.COsdMolZraFRTdP8]{Effect: Prevailing Position}

entries.name: Primal Aegis
entries.description: You surround yourself with a thick field of protective primal energy. You and allies within 30 feet of you gain resistance equal to your Wisdom modifier to acid, cold, electricity, fire, negative, and positive damage.

entries.name: Primal Breadth
entries.description: Increase the spell slots you gain from druid archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell slots.

entries.name: Primal Evolution
entries.description: You can call upon the creatures of the wild for aid. You gain an additional spell slot of your highest level, which you can use only to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Summon Animal} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jSRAyd57kd4WZ4yE]{Summon Plant or Fungus}. You can cast either of these spells using that spell slot, even if it they aren't in your spell repertoire.

entries.name: Primal Focus
entries.description: Your connection to nature is particularly strong, and the spirits of nature flock around you, helping you replenish your focus. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

entries.name: Primal Summons
entries.description: Whenever you summon an ally, you can empower it with the elemental power of air, earth, fire, or water. You gain the primal summons order spell.

entries.name: Primal Wellspring
entries.description: Your reservoir of Focus Points is a deep wellspring. If you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 3 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

entries.name: Pristine Weapon
entries.description: Your verdant weapon can cut through the resistances of magical creatures. The weapon is treated as cold iron and silver. If you critically hit a creature that has a weakness to cold iron or silver, the target takes @Localize[PF2E.PD.Bleed.1d6] as the primal energies within your weapon slow its natural healing.

entries.name: Пропеллерное Крепление
entries.description:
Вы научились прикреплять заводные пропеллеры к своим ежедневным силкам для быстрой установки, в которых используются шестеренки.

Это позволяет вам устанавливать силки в воздухе или под водой, где они остаются на месте вплоть до 10 минут, после чего у пропеллера заканчивается мощность, и они падают или тонут. Если только вы не используете дополнительные меры предосторожности, чтобы спрятать их, тогда местоположение пропеллерного силка крайне очевидно.

entries.name: Protect Ally
entries.description: You place your body between your friends and your enemies, protecting your allies against oncoming attacks. You choose one adjacent ally. That ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn or until that ally is no longer adjacent to you, whichever comes first. You can only protect a single ally in this way. If you choose to Protect a different Ally, the previous ally loses the bonus to AC.

entries.name: Protective Bond
entries.description:
Trigger You and your eidolon are in a damaging effect's area.

The power of your bond can protect you and your eidolon from harm. If you and your eidolon would take different amounts of damage from the area effect, you take the lower amount of damage instead of the greater amount of damage.

Special This feat has the trait matching your eidolon's tradition (arcane, divine, occult, or primal).

entries.name: Prototype Companion
entries.description: You have created a construct companion, and while it might not be an innovation, it serves as a trustworthy minion. You gain a prototype construct companion.

entries.name: Provocator Dedication
entries.description:
Access Successfully defeat the eberarks in the Irorium.

For you, fighting is as much about style as skill. You become trained in simple weapons, martial weapons, and one advanced weapon of your choice. When you critically succeed at an attack roll using your chosen advanced weapon, you also apply the critical specialization of that weapon. You become an expert in Performance and your choice of either Acrobatics or Athletics. If you were an expert in all three of these skills, you instead become an expert in a skill of your choice.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the provocator archetype.

entries.name: Purifying Spell
entries.description: You purify the water within a creature's body to cleanse them of illness. If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} targeting a single living creature, you can attempt to counteract a disease or poison affecting the target, in addition to the other benefits of heal. If you do, heal gains the water trait.

entries.name: Поднажать
entries.description:
Вы можете вывести производительность своего транспортного средства за пределы, предусмотренные его создателями.

Каждый раз, когда вы получаете Успех проверки пилотирования, управляемый вами транспорт до конца вашего хода получает бонус Обстоятельства +5ФТ ко всем своим Скоростям. Если вы получаете Крит.Успех, этот бонус увелич. до +10ФТ

entries.name: Pushing Attack
entries.description: Your eidolon has an attack that pushes away enemies. Choose one of the eidolon's unarmed attacks with the shove trait. It gains the @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.t6cx9FOODmeZQNYl]{Push} action for that attack.

entries.name: Быстрый Алхимик
entries.description: Вы получаете действие @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.sPtl05wwTpqFI0lL]{Быстрая Алхимия}

entries.name: Quick Block
entries.description: You can block with your shield instinctively. At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to perform a Shield Block.

entries.name: Quick Change (Vigilante)
entries.description: You can shift between your identities with ease. Instead of spending 1 minute to change your identity, you can now do so as a 3-action activity. If you are legendary in Deception, you can perform this change as a 1-action activity.

entries.name: Быстро Прикрепляющий
entries.description:
Вы можете прикрепить талисман используя немного клея и веревки.

Вы получаете способность навыка @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x9xA8P2Vlz98He7C]{Быстрое Прикрепление}, даже если не соответствуете ее Пред.Услов.. Когда вы используете ее, то можете прикрепить или убрать вплоть до 4 талисманов за 1 минуту, вместо только 1 талисмана.

На 12-м уровне, независимо от вашего уровня мастерства Ремесла, вы можете @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UAaQk93a30nx0nYY]{Прикрепить Талисман} за 3действия.

entries.name: Quick Juggler
entries.description: When you start to juggle or add another item to those you are Juggling, you add two items instead of one. Increase the maximum number of items you can Juggle by one.

entries.name: Quick Mount
entries.description:
Requirements You are adjacent to a creature that is at least

one size larger than you and is willing to be your mount.

You and your mount can spring into action at a moment's notice. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PM5jvValFkbFH3TV]{Mount} the creature and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal} to issue it an order of your choice.

entries.name: Quick Shot
entries.description: You draw your bow and attack with the same action. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to draw a weapon from the bow weapon group that is loaded or has reload 0, then Strike with that weapon.

entries.name: Quick Snares
entries.description: You can rig a snare in only moments. You can Craft snares that normally take 1 minute to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} with 3 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} actions, even if you haven't prepared them.

entries.name: Quick Stow (Swordmaster)
entries.description: You know that situations can change rapidly and might leave you needing to change equipment in the middle of combat. Your training has taught you how to swap your equipment on the fly. You Interact to stow a weapon and then Interact again to draw a readied item or weapon.

entries.name: Quick Study
entries.description:
During your daily preparations, you can study a particular subject to gain the trained proficiency rank in one Lore skill of your choice. You must have interacted with that subject in some way on the previous day, whether by reading about it, talking to someone knowledgeable on the topic, or experiencing it yourself.

Alternatively, you can reference your notes to instead choose a Lore skill you've prepared before with Quick Study. This proficiency lasts until you prepare again. Since this proficiency is temporary, you can't use it as a prerequisite for a skill increase or a permanent character option like a feat.

entries.name: Quicken Heartbeat
entries.description:
Frequency once per turn

You've replaced your heart with one made of animated quicksilver and living adamantine. You reduce your @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} condition by 1. Alternatively, if you are not slowed, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1} during your next turn, and can use your extra action to Stride or Strike.

entries.name: Quickened Attunement
entries.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements Your previous action was Attunement Shift.

If your next action is to cast a spell that would grant your terrain attunement bonus, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (to a minimum of 1 action).

Special You can't use Quickened Attunement and @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.z2ptq23nNBOeEI7H]{Quickened Casting} in the same round.

entries.name: Ускоренное Колдовство
entries.description:
Частота: 1/День

Если ваше следующее действие - @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Сотворение Заклинания}, которое хотя бы на 2 уровня ниже, чем имеющийся у вас наивысший Слот Заклинания, снизьте количество действий для его сотворения на 1 (до минимум 1 действия).

entries.name: Quivering Palm
entries.description: Your strikes can kill foes. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ovvflf5aFbmBxqq8]{Quivering Palm} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

entries.name: Radiant Blade Master
entries.description:
Your divine ally turns your chosen weapon into a paragon of its type.

When you choose the weapon for your blade divine ally during your preparations, add the following property runes to the list of effects you can choose from: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DCPsilr8wbPXxTUv]{Dancing}, @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.HjfIXg5btodThCTW]{Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune (Greater)}, and @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Gf7h44DcTB43464h]{Effect: Blade Ally Keen Rune}.

entries.name: Radiant Blade Spirit
entries.description:
Your divine ally radiates power, enhancing your chosen weapon.

When you choose the weapon for your blade ally during your daily preparations, add the following property runes to the list of effects you can choose from: @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.YxYr18vleIt2t3RS]{Effect: Blade Ally Flaming Rune} and any aligned properties (@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.xLXFK4mtzgAF4zvx]{Effect: Blade Ally Anarchic Rune}, @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.ZzE6jPbCyUqEqhcb]{Effect: Blade Ally Axiomatic Rune}, @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.l98IthkklgLDJXIo]{Effect: Blade Ally Holy Rune}, or @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.rGSc2PtvU3mgm18S]{Effect: Blade Ally Unholy Rune}) that match your cause's alignment.

entries.name: Сияющее Влияние
entries.description:
Вы вливаете живительную позитивную энергию в живого союзника.

Если следующее используемое действие - сотворение @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Исцеление} для восстановления Очков Здоровья одному живому существу, то до конца своего следующего хода, цель наносит дополнительные 1d6 позитивного урона своим оружием ближнего боя и безоружными атаками.

▲ Эффект: @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.cH8JD3ub4eEKuIAD]{Effect: Radiant Infusion}

Усиление: Если заклинание @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Исцеление} хотя бы 5-го уровня, этот урон увеличивается до 2d6, а если хотя бы 8-го уровня, то урон увеличивается до 3d6.

entries.name: Rain-Scribe Mobility
entries.description: You surround yourself in a mantle of Rain-Scribe magic and Stride twice; difficult terrain does not reduce your Speed, even if the difficult terrain has been manipulated by magic. Your magic clears the difficult terrain in each square you entered; until your next turn, those squares aren't difficult terrain for any creature walking through them (or are normal difficult terrain if they were previously greater difficult terrain).

entries.name: Rain-Scribe Sustenance
entries.description:
You use the power of your Rain-Scribe magic to draw on a stream of primal power for sustenance. You don't need to eat or drink and need only 6 hours of rest to feel well rested. You must still rest at least 8 hours and spend 1 hour of preparation to regain resources usable only a limited number of times per day, such as spell slots.

You can draw on primal power to stay awake and alert while otherwise resting your body and mind, gaining the full benefits of an 8-hour rest without falling asleep. When you do, you lose the other benefits of Rain- Scribe Sustenance for 1 week while your primal energies recharge.

entries.name: Ranged Combatant
entries.description:
Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

When you select this feat, choose a damage type: acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, negative, piercing, positive, or slashing. If your eidolon is a celestial, fiend, or monitor with an alignment other than true neutral, you can choose a damage type in its alignment.

entries.name: Ranged Combatant (Acid)
entries.description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 acid damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

entries.name: Ranged Combatant (Bludgeoning)
entries.description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 bludgeoning damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

entries.description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 chaotic damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

entries.name: Ranged Combatant (Cold)
entries.description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 cold damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

entries.name: Ranged Combatant (Electricity)
entries.description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 electricity damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

entries.description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 evil damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

entries.name: Ranged Combatant (Fire)
entries.description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 fire damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

entries.name: Ranged Combatant (Good)
entries.description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 good damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

entries.description:
Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

When you select this feat, choose a damage type: acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, negative, piercing, positive, or slashing. If your eidolon is a celestial, fiend, or monitor with an alignment other than true neutral, you can choose a damage type in its alignment.

entries.description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 negative damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

entries.name: Ranged Combatant (Piercing)
entries.description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 piercing damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

entries.name: Ranged Combatant (Positive)
entries.description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 positive damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

entries.name: Ranged Combatant (Slashing)
entries.description: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged unarmed attack with a range increment of 30 feet that deals 1d4 slashing damage and has the magical and propulsive traits.

entries.name: Ranged Disarm
entries.description:
Requirements You're wielding a simple firearm.

When using a simple firearm, you can shoot objects right out of your enemy's hands. Attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} the target using a ranged attack roll with your simple firearm, instead of attempting an Athletics check against the target's Reflex DC.

entries.name: Посвящение Рейнджера
entries.description:
♦ Вы становитесь ОБУЧЕН Выживанию ;

Если вы уже ОБУЧЕН Выживанию , то вместо этого обучаетесь другому навыку на свой выбор.

♦ Вы становитесь ОБУЧЕН КС Рейнджера.

♦ Вы можете использовать действие @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Выслеживать Добычу}.

Особенность: Вы не можете выбрать другую способность посвящения, пока не получите 2 другие способности из архетипа рейнджера.

entries.name: Рейнджерская Стойкость
entries.description:
Вы получаете дополнительные 3 ОЗ за каждую имеющуюся у вас классовую способность архетипа рейнджера.

По мере продолжения получения классовых способностей архетипа рейнджера, вы продолжаете получать дополнительные ОЗ таким способом.

entries.name: Ranger's Bramble
entries.description: You can cause plants to grow and trap your foes with thorns. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.KktHf7zIAWOr499h]{Ranger's Bramble} warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

entries.name: Rapid Manifestation
entries.description:
Trigger You roll initiative or a hazard attacks you.

Your unwavering soul brings up your defenses as soon as you're in danger. You Manifest your Soulforged Armament.

entries.name: Rapid Recharge
entries.description:
Frequency once per day

You tap into an arcane trick to recover your ability to meld spells and attacks. You recharge your Spellstrike.

entries.name: Быстрое Реагирование
entries.description:
Во время опасности, вы действуете быстро и эффективно, чтобы предоставить необходимую помощь.

Триггер: ОЗ союзника снижено до 0

Вы делаете @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Перемещение} к спровоцировавшему союзнику. Во время этого движения, вы получаете бонус Обстоятельства +10ФТ Скорости.

entries.name: Reach Beyond
entries.description: You've learned to move your spiritual energy past yourself to attack spirits where others can't. You can make melee Strikes against incorporeal creatures that are inside solid objects as long as the object is within your reach. An incorporeal creature inside of a solid object is hidden, requiring you to succeed at a DC 11 flat check when you target it. You can spend an action, which has the concentrate trait, to focus on a creature inside of a solid object. If you do, the next melee Strike you make this turn requires you to succeed at only a DC 6 flat check to affect the creature.

entries.name: Reach for the Sky
entries.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm.

You command the room, firing a gun into the air and ordering everyone to surrender and put their hands in the air. You fire your firearm and then attempt a single Intimidation check to Demoralize each enemy within 30 feet. Creatures who become frightened instinctively put their hands in the air. If they had Raised a Shield, they lose the benefits, as they raise the shield above their head where it's of little use to block attacks. With their hands in the air, each of these frightened creatures can't use reactions or free actions that require their hands, or items held in their hands, until the beginning of their next turn. Regardless of the result, each creature is then temporarily immune to Reach for the Sky for 1 minute.

entries.name: Reach for the Stars
entries.description: The sky's the limit, as long as you've got enough black powder. When you use Black Powder Boost, you can expend additional black powder or ammunition to boost yourself farther. For each dose of black powder or piece of firearm ammunition you spend in addition to your shot, you add another 10 feet to the height or distance of your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, to a maximum of 5 boosts (a +50-foot status bonus). You must be wearing a dose of black powder or piece of ammunition, or have it in hand, to detonate it for a boost. You can choose at which points in your Leap you detonate each boost, allowing you to change direction each time. You must then move in a straight line until you boost again or end your Leap.

entries.name: Reactive Charm
entries.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You are the target of a spell or attack.

You're so charming and distracting that when pressed, you can cast a simple enchantment in time to foil an attacker. You cast any of your 1st-level enchantment spells that normally take two actions or fewer to cast. This takes effect before the triggering spell or attack, and if the attacker is affected by your spell, it can make different decisions based on the effects (for instance, if you charm the attacker and it becomes friendly to you, it can choose a different target than you for its attack or spell). The attacking creature must be in range of your chosen spell, and if your spell requires targets, the attacking creature must be a valid target. Your spell affects only the attacking creature, even if it would normally affect more targets or an area.

entries.name: Reactive Dismissal
entries.description:
Trigger Your eidolon would take damage.

You abruptly dismiss your eidolon to reduce the damage it takes, though this makes summoning it again more difficult. Reduce the triggering damage to your eidolon by double your level, and your eidolon unmanifests. You can't Manifest your Eidolon again until after the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Reactive Distraction
entries.description:
Trigger You would be hit by an attack or targeted by an effect, or you are within an effect's area.

Requirements You have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MjhCcwGKyI5dpNIY]{Perfect Distraction} ready to use.

You reactively switch with your decoy to foil your foe. You use Perfection Distraction, even if you were observed, as long as you end the movement of your Sneak while concealed or in a location with cover or greater cover.

Your decoy is targeted by the attack or effect instead of you. In the case of an area effect, if your Sneak doesn't move you out of the area, both you and the decoy are targeted by the effect.

entries.name: Reactive Interference
entries.description:
Trigger An adjacent enemy begins to use a reaction.

Grabbing a sleeve, swiping with your weapon, or creating another obstruction, you reflexively foil an enemy's response. If the triggering creature's level is equal to or lower than yours, you disrupt the triggering reaction. If the triggering creature's level is higher than yours, you must make an attack roll against its AC. On a success, you disrupt the reaction.

entries.name: Ответное Преследование
entries.description:
Триггер: Враг, находящийся рядом с вами, отходит от вас, и вы при помощи действия @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Перемещение} можете достигнуть хотя бы одного квадрата пространства рядом с врагом.

Вы идете в ногу с отступающим врагом.

Вы @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Перемещаетесь}, но должны закончить свое движение рядом с спровоцир. врагом. Ваше движение не провоцирует 5реакции от этого триггернувшего врага.

Вы можете использовать Ответ.Преслед., чтобы @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Рыть}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Карабкаться}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Лететь} или @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Плыть}, вместо @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Перемещения}, если у вас есть соответствующий вид движения.

entries.name: Reactive Transformation
entries.description:
Trigger varies

You transform reflexively when in danger. You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8RWfKConLYFZpQ9X]{Wild Shape} to transform into one form granted by one of the prerequisite feats you have, depending on the trigger. Your form's resistances and weaknesses apply against the triggering damage.

Trigger You fall 10 feet or more

Effect Choose a form from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form}.

Trigger You take acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage

Effect Choose a form from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form} that resists the triggering damage.

Trigger You take fire damage

Effect Choose a fire elemental form from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form}.

Trigger You take poison damage

Effect Choose a form from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}.

entries.name: Предвидеть Катастрофу
entries.description:
Вы тратите 10 минут и открываете себя божественным таинствам мира, заглядывая в наиболее зловещие предвестия будущего.

Вы получаете эффекты @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Предзнаменование}, за исключением того, что вы узнаете об опасностях грядущего; вместо "ничего" - любые результаты "благо", а вместо "беда" - результаты "благо и беда".

Если вы ЛЕГЕНДА Религии, то Предвидение Катастрофы занимает у вас только 1 минуту.

entries.name: Read Shibboleths
entries.description:
All communication is filled with slight tells and signals. If you interact with someone for at least 10 minutes, their regional words, pronunciation changes, and nonverbal cues provide you with a minor fact about their social environment, such as their hometown or certain groups they might belong to.

If a target of this ability is being deceptive about their social environment, such as a commoner pretending to be a noble, they must attempt a Deception, Society, or appropriate Lore check against your Society DC, providing you a false minor fact consistent with their assumed identity on a success.

Once you've gleaned one or more true minor facts about a person, you can then incorporate these mannerisms into your speech to present yourself in a way that they find familiar. This grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks with them.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.ivGiUp0EC5nWT9Hb]{Effect: Read Shibboleths}

entries.name: Read the Land
entries.description: You've learned how to commune with the land to learn information. You learn the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.l4LFwY7iuzX6sDXr]{Commune with Nature} ritual if you didn't know it already. You can perform this ritual with a casting time of 1 hour instead of 1 day and without a secondary caster.

entries.name: Reaper of Repose
entries.description: Your skill and fervor allow you to pierce undead defenses and exploit their weaknesses. When you make an attack using a weapon with which you have master proficiency and hit an undead creature, you ignore 5 points of the creature's resistances, and the undead's weaknesses are 2 higher against your attack.

entries.name: Reason Rapidly
entries.description: Your mind works through clues at an unbelievable speed. You instantly use up to five @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{Recall Knowledge} actions. If you have any special abilities or free actions that would normally be triggered when you Recall Knowledge, you can't use them for these actions.

entries.name: Rebounding Assault
entries.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or loaded crossbow in one hand and a bludgeoning or slashing melee weapon in the other.

You hurl your melee weapon at an opponent, then fire a bullet into the weapon's hilt, making it deal additional damage and bounce back to your grasp. Make a thrown ranged Strike with the melee weapon, then a ranged Strike with your firearm. Both Strikes use the same multiple attack penalty. If the melee weapon doesn't already have the thrown trait, it gains the thrown 10 feet trait during a Rebounding Assault.

If both attacks are successful, the bolt or bullet hits the thrown melee weapon instead of your target, adding its force into one attack. Combine the damage from both Strikes, using the thrown weapon's damage type, and add an additional [[/r 1d6[precision]]]{1d6 precision damage}. The impact sends the melee weapon rebounding off the target and back to your hand.

In any circumstance other than both attacks hitting, carry out the individual Strikes normally. The thrown weapon doesn't rebound and remains in the target's space as normal for thrown weapons.

entries.name: Восстановить Заклинание
entries.description:
Вы научились манипулировать преобразованиями магии и подобными резонансным всплесками. Вы возвращаете себе магию развеянного заклинания, используя ее, чтобы подготовить заклинание с продолжительностью.

Вы можете @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Развеять} заклинание 4-го уровня или ниже, которое вы наложили сегодня из ячейки заклинания, у которого осталось по крайней мере половина его продолжительности, даже если это заклинание не может быть @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Развеяно} обычным образом.

Затем вы можете потратить 10 минут на повторную подготовку заклинания в этом слоте заклинаний, как часть активности @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.a1TSGGsA6b5gjP3H]{Переподготовить Заклинание}.

entries.name: Recognize Threat
entries.description:
Requirements You have master proficiency in a skill to identify the triggering creature.

Trigger Your first turn of an encounter begins, and you can see a creature.

You quickly assess the threat so you can relay the information to your team. Attempt a Recall Knowledge check against the triggering creature.

entries.name: Recollect Studies
entries.description:
Requirements You're fighting a creature of your level or lower that could be identified by Recall Knowledge with a skill in which you're an expert.

You paid attention during your studies and remember the right way to attack various creatures. Choose a creature that meets the requirements. You learn the resistances, immunities, or weaknesses of the creature (your choice) without needing to successfully Recall Knowledge.

entries.name: Reconstruct The Scene
entries.description:
You spend 1 minute surveying a small location (such as a single room) to get an impression of events that occurred there in the last day. This involves moving about the area and studying footprints, the placement of objects, spilled drinks or blood, and so forth.

You get an indistinct mental impression of significant events that happened there. This gives you clues and details of the past, including the overall events and their time frame, but it's not a perfect record. This also isn't enough to identify who was involved in these events if you weren't already aware the person was there.

As determined by the GM, you also pick out various seemingly small details that could serve as important clues, like a memorable weapon someone used for a murder or the type of cloak someone wore when passing through.

entries.name: Recover Spell
entries.description:
Requirements An enemy's action disrupted your attempts to Cast a Spell since the beginning of your last turn.

You recover the energy of a recently disrupted spell, allowing you to cast it again as long as you do so immediately before the energy dissipates. You regain the use of a spell that was disrupted since the beginning of your last turn, but you must immediately Cast the Spell again with your next action or else you lose the spell; as normal for metamagic, this must be on the same turn that you use Recover Spell. You can change the area, targets, and other variables, including the number of actions used to Cast the Spell if the spell allows, such as when casting @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Magic Missile}.

entries.name: Recycled Cogwheels
entries.description: You're able to scavenge the cogwheels from your daily quick-deploy snares that use gears. This allows you to deconstruct a snare that didn't trigger in order to set the snare up somewhere else. Doing so takes the same number of actions as setting the snare did. When you do, you recover the snare and can deploy it in another location.

entries.name: Red Mantis Assassin Dedication
entries.description:
Access You are from Mediogalti Island.

You have learned how to stalk your foes and slay them with a sawtooth sabre. You become trained in Stealth and Assassin Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Whenever your proficiency in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wkzxLpSe7LN6c5Ld]{Sawtooth Saber}.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Red Mantis assassin archetype.

entries.name: Redirect Elements
entries.description:
Trigger The spell attack roll for a foe's spell with an elemental trait targeting you fails or critically fails.

You seize the elemental essence of an incoming spell and redirect the spell to a creature of your choice within the spell's area. The attacker rerolls the spell's attack roll against the new target.

entries.name: Redirecting Shot
entries.description:
Trigger An ally misses with a ranged attack that uses a thrown weapon or ammunition. The ally must be willing to accept your assistance, you must see the attack's target, and the attack's target must be within the first range increment of your firearm or crossbow.

Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm or crossbow.

Seeing your ally's attack about to go astray, you fire your weapon to right its course. Discharge your firearm and roll a d20. Your ally uses this roll instead of their own, and the attack ignores bonuses the target would gain against the attack from lesser or standard cover.

entries.name: Отражение Заклинания
entries.description:
Когда вы успешно используете @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EpBG4CFMNSZQx7vI]{Контрзаклинание}, чтобы @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.mmfWcV3Iyql5nzTo]{Противодействовать} заклинанию, которое действует на существ или область, вы можете обратить эффект этого заклинания на его колдуна.

Будучи отраженным, заклинание действует только на изначального колдуна, даже если это заклинание действующее на область или, если бы оно воздействовало более чем на 1 существо. Изначальный заклинатель, как обычно может сделать Спас. и использовать другие защиты против отраженного заклинания.

entries.name: Reflexive Catch
entries.description:
Requirements The item or thrown weapon is of a Bulk you can Juggle. If the trigger was a thrown weapon attack targeting you, you can't be flat-footed to the attack. If you were already Juggling, you can't be Juggling your maximum number of items.

Trigger An item falls within your reach or an attacker fails an attack roll to hit you or a creature within your reach with a thrown weapon.

You grab the triggering item. If you are Juggling, you can immediately add the item to the objects you're Juggling as a free action, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits.

entries.name: Reflexive Grip
entries.description: You keep hold of your weapons even when knocked out. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when defending against checks to Disarm you. In addition, when you fall unconscious, you don't drop any weapons that you're currently wielding, though somebody else can remove them from you.

entries.name: Reflexive Riposte
entries.description: You can riposte almost without a thought. At the start of each of your turns when you regain your actions, you gain an additional reaction that can be used only to perform an @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EfjoIuDmtUn4yiow]{Opportune Riposte}.

entries.name: Reinforce Eidolon
entries.description: You buffer your eidolon. You gain the reinforce eidolon link cantrip.

entries.name: Rejuvenating Touch
entries.description:
Your healing energies linger after you cast, providing continual benefits.

An ally that recovers Hit Points from your @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} gains 10 temporary Hit Points at the start of their turn during each of the next 10 rounds. This effect ends if the ally is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.oaRt210JV4GZIHmJ]{Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Touch}

entries.name: Relentless Disarm
entries.description:
When you succeed, but don't critically succeed, at a check to Disarm a creature, your circumstance bonus to further checks to Disarm that creature is +4 instead of +2. Other creatures gain only the normal bonus.

When you critically succeed at a Disarm check, you can immediately Demoralize your target as a reaction.

entries.name: Reloading Trick
entries.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements You're holding an unloaded hand crossbow.

You can fire off a single shot even when unprepared. You Interact to reload your hand crossbow and Strike with it.

Special If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HvPvyeXM2iMK4OYf]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Training} feat, you can use this feat with a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zcrIuILnp6oh4dr9]{Repeating Hand Crossbow} to load either a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AITVZmakiu3RgfKo]{Bolt} or a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.9w8MrBhFtvM7RrYN]{Magazine}, but the speed means you can fire only one bolt, then the magazine jams. You must spend a 3-action Interact activity to remove the jammed magazine and clear it before it can be used again.

entries.name: Remediate
entries.description:
Frequency once per hour

If your next action is to use your divine font to cast a 3-action @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spell to damage creatures, you can harness the residual energy to counterbalance opposing forces.

You use your heal or harm spell to attempt to counteract one effect in the spell's area with the chaotic, evil, good, or lawful trait. The chosen trait must oppose one component of your deity's alignment; if your deity is neutral, you can choose any one trait.

entries.name: Remember Your Training
entries.description:
Frequency once per day

During your training to become a Pathfinder Agent you were schooled on a wide variety of creatures you might encounter, and you can think back to that training to gain crucial insight in times of need. Attempt a check to Recall Knowledge about a creature you can see, adding your level as a proficiency bonus if you are untrained (rather than 0). If you roll a failure (but not a critical failure) on this check, you get a success instead.

entries.name: Reminder of the Greater Fear
entries.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger Another creature within 30 feet of you that can see you would gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition.

You give a target a stern glower to remind them that it is you, and no one else, they should truly fear. Reduce the value of the frightened condition the creature would take by 1.

entries.name: Remote Trigger
entries.description:
You've learned how to trigger snares from afar, creating ranged hazards to assail your opponents and allowing you to disarm enemies' snares harmlessly.

You can Strike a snare to trigger it prematurely. If you crafted the snare, you automatically hit. If someone else crafted it, attempt a ranged Strike against the Crafting DC, triggering the snare only if you hit.

entries.name: Repeating Hand Crossbow Training
entries.description:
You become trained in the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zcrIuILnp6oh4dr9]{Repeating Hand Crossbow} and gain access to repeating hand crossbows and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.oJZe5rRitvioUgRh]{Shootist Bandolier}. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the repeating hand crossbow. If you're at least an expert in a repeating hand crossbow you're using, you gain access to its critical specialization effect. You can perform the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.hV9wXLvgH2LBaBwk]{Shootist's Draw} action with repeating hand crossbows.

Special If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.meQJfsKVar9tm6c9]{Running Reload} feat, you can reload a repeating hand crossbow @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.9w8MrBhFtvM7RrYN]{Magazine} on the move. You can use Running Reload as a 3-action activity to reload a magazine into a repeating hand crossbow after you Stride, Step, or Sneak, or as a 2-action activity if you use a magazine from a shootist bandolier.

entries.name: Replenishment of War
entries.description: Striking out against your enemies draws praise and protection from your deity. When you damage a creature with a Strike using your deity's favored weapon, you gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, or equal to your level if the Strike was a critical hit. These temporary Hit Points last until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Переподготовить Заклинание
entries.description:
Вы открыли способ повторного использования слотов заклинаний раз за разом.

Вы можете потратить 10 минут, чтобы подготовить заклинание, которое вы уже сегодня колдовали, восстанавливая доступ к этому слоту заклинания. Заклинание должно быть 4-го уровня или ниже и из тех, которое не имеет продолжительности. Таким способом вы можете подготовить заклинание, даже если вы уже переподготовили его ранее в этот же день.

Если у вас есть диссертация @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.QzWXMCSGNfvvpYgF]{Подмена Заклинаний}, то можете подготавливать в израсходованном слоте другое заклинание, до тех пор, пока у нового заклинания нет продолжительности. Как только вы переподготовили заклинание в этом слоте хоть раз, то можете использовать свою диссертацию, чтобы подменить в этом слоте только заклинания без продолжительности.

entries.name: Repurposed Parts
entries.description: You are familiar with the fittings and cogwheels of your snares and can repurpose parts from prepared quick-deploy snares to assemble a new creation on the fly. Using two of the snares you prepared for quick deployment during daily preparations, you can quickly deploy a different snare that you know how to Craft, even if you didn't prepare that snare during your daily preparations.

entries.name: Rescuer's Press
entries.description: Any shield you wield gains the shove trait. When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} using a shield and Stride as part of that action, you can move an additional 5 feet to either side of the creature you Shoved.
